excerpts.content: We, the Pleiadians, connect with your calling of the service to the One Supreme Creator and for the service of all beings in your plane at this time. Today, as per your mind collective, we are going to tell you how a 4th density planet operates and how beings operate on such planets. We will do this as much as is possible using your language because some of the concepts that are active on a 4th density planet cannot be explained using your language terms. Also know this that the instrument known as SAM is just a channel and as per our agreement, he has agreed to step aside when we speak through him and transfer the messages through the veil. This might be relevant information for your planet at this time because your planet is moving into the 4th density. All of you who are alive today on earth are witnessing and will witness a pivotal event in the earth's history that is the graduation of your planet from the 3rd density vibration into the 4th density vibration. Firstly, let us tell you what exactly does the word density refer to. Density means the amount of light that can be contained within any particular dimension. The amount of information depends on the amount of light. More light means more information. With more light, consciousness can express itself into more diverse ways. As your planet continues to transition out of a 3rd density vibration type into the 4th, the entire planet and all the entities living in it including the plant and the animal life forms as well as humans will start to resonate a 4th density vibration. We are going to try to tell you exactly what that will look like and feel like in your language terms. As many of your beings already are aware that the 4th density corresponds to the so-called green ray chakra of the heart. It is the density of love which literally means the feeling of oneness. In simple terms, a 4th density planet is one wherein all the beings that are on the planet come together and work as one group. This may be easier for your kind to understand from our vantage point. Just for a moment imagine if the council allowed us to directly appear on earth to meet the people on your planet. Then at that time we would not be concerned about the 3rd density particulars such as those that your people indulge in at the moment such as one human belongs to one race and the other belongs to the other race and so on. This is the last thing that you will find in a 4th density planet. We refer to the residents of a planet as same no matter even if there may be some differences in their diet, speech, culture or otherwise. Since they belong to the same planet for us they will be thought of as one. In a 4th density planet such separation between entities of the same planet do not exist. Therefore until your kind achieves this level of self-realization, no insights will be truly genuine yet. When you know beyond any shadow of a doubt that the same life that flows through you flows through everything, then the love for yourself becomes the love for all naturally and effortlessly. This is 4th density consciousness. Let us tell you that the green ray chakra of the heart as you know it is the gateway that leads to the upper 3 chakras and acts as a bridge between the upper and lower chakras. Without activating the green ray it is almost impossible to activate the abilities of the blue, indigo or violet ray chakras and to access the powers vested within each of the chakras. Therefore we must say that at this point, for all the beings on earth, an openness of heart is the key that will lead you to get access to all the abilities in consciousness and there is a very good reason for this. This is due to the simple fact that all of creation is one and one is in all of creation. This is due to the fact that in 4th density consciousness, the awareness of perfect oneness is required to see all others as yourself and to love and treat them exactly as you would treat yourselves. In the 4th density, let us give you a brief outline of the various sections in the 4th density that you will progress through in your time. It may be considered as a future projection or a future prediction for your kind. There are 8 sections to this density into which you are now heading towards. In the first section, your beings will become more unified and channels of communication between separate parts of the planet will begin to happen at the speed of light. In this first section, all the corruptions and all the negative oriented events will be exposed much faster. Then after a certain time, you will enter into the second section which is the most vital for any beings on any 4th density planet to pass through. That is the creation of simple telepathic communication mechanisms. This will not be an advanced form of telepathy that you will see on a 5th density planet. However, it will be of a basic type. As your brains begin to change in its molecular density as the planet progresses, you will begin to understand much more about how the other being is feeling, and you will start to talk with them in your dreams or while you are thinking about them. The information sometimes gets transferred directly without ever having to talk with the other beings. However, this will be refined in the later phases of the 5th density. This leads to the third section of the 4th density in which people begin to become more oriented towards spirituality and meditation. This section will have most of the beings performing daily meditations for hours and hours. After the 3rd section of the 4th density, other planetary entities will start to show themselves more and more to people of your planet. This will lead to the creation of communication channel between various planetary entities in the cosmos. After the 4th section, it is most important section that is the 5th section in which the veil of forgetting completely gets lifted from your life. And all the beings on earth begin to understand a life that they had lived before. They understand that they had been a man and a woman in the prior life, a plant, a stone, and many other things in the process of evolution. This section will lead your peoples to become more unified. The number of families that you know of now will be multiplied by 10,000 times in this section of the 4th density. After successfully reaching this 5th section, the next 6th section begins to emerge which is a section wherein your kind will leave behind the ability of using verbal communication. This section will lead to the enhancement of your telepathic abilities. It will be enhanced enough to allow humans to communicate telepathically. This will be the ending of the so-called ego mind by your kind. Your ego is made up of words, however. Most do not realize that once there are no words in your mind, the ego is gone and you will see your true self, the source of oneness with all. Late 4th density leads to the later sections, that of the 7th and 8th sections, in which your bodies will become more light-like, and your imaginations will immediately start to manifest. Whatever you desire will start to happen faster and faster. After the ending of the 8th section, your kind will graduate into the 5th density. The transition from the 3rd to the 4th density may take between 100 to 1,000 years, depending on the progress made by your kind. This session was energy depleting for the instruments. We would request the instruments to kindly sleep for 2 hours, more than it does, to restore its vital energy. Until we meet again, bye Beloveds.

We are the Syrian High Council. We feel your vibration, connection, greetings, beloved, in the love and the light of the one Supreme Creator. What we are going to voice through you today is going to sound unbelievable to some people. Do not worry. You have the liberty to reject our messages if you do not find fit for your beliefs. Today, as we scan your mind collective, we notice that you want to know more about the ones you call the reptilians. Before we begin, however, we would like to address the so-called light workers on your planet at this critical point in the evolution of humankind. In simple terms, a so-called being, light worker, is the one who feels in its inner gut that it needs to help others and acts on that feeling. There are many terms that your kind knows them by, such as crystal babies, indigos, earth angels, and starseeds. These spiritual beings volunteer to act as a beacon for the earth and commit to serving humanity to assist in the process of ascension. Now, as the earth has started to enter into the next density, most of the beings who will incarnate on this planet, or should we say, born on this planet, will be those that are of more positive and light-oriented souls. These souls have been sent in order to assist in the ascension of Kaya and assist the other souls who are finding it hard to raise their vibration and move into the next density of consciousness. However, the light workers are only here to show the path the choice of each soul still remains to either choose the positive or the negative path. They are only the wasteavers. An approximate number of 7 million light workers have incarnated on earth till today. As we can sense from the planetary vibration, more will come soon. In short, the light workers are awakened beings who bear the highest interests of all the living beings and earth in their minds. They hold a distinctive core of kindness within themselves and vibrate at a higher energy level that enables them to be positive and support others through their struggles. Not all light workers realize their purpose on earth from the moment they are born. However, when they do so upon self-actualization or upon self-awareness, they need not dramatically transform their life. In fact, it is possible for them to lead a regular life and career while simultaneously shifting their light and shining their light, helping and supporting others and creating positive experiences for those around them. The light workers who are listening to us today, we would like to thank you all for the pain and the suffering you have endured in the journey of ascension of Kaya. Do not be shaken by the negative-oriented entities that you meet on your pathway. You will be shown the way of the light and in the end you will realize the kind of service that you have done at this critical junction of the evolution of human consciousness. Now, we shall address the second query you are holding in your mind collective. The so-called reptilians were seen many times by your species in the ancient times and were worshipped many times in your primitive past. For example, in your religious systems of the so-called Egyptian tribes that you know of, the so-called the Indonesian tribes, the so-called the Indian tribes that you know of, all have a significant worshipping of the reptilian humanoid beings who had uncanny powers that they had showed previously to your ancestors. You can find such figures that people worship religiously also in the southern part of the so-called American continent that you know of. And you can find drawings of these humanoids in various temples, some of the other eastern traditions that you know of. The so-called Indian and Asian traditions have also described these reptilian species in many of their writings. These reptilians use an advanced array of tunnel systems that lie more than 300 to 400 meters inside the crust of your planet. They use some desolate areas of barren lands as entry points into these tunnels in order to avoid detection by your kind. These reptilians use an advanced form of camouflage to hide themselves from the other human beings. These reptilians have advanced mental abilities in comparison to your species. They have learned to use more than 55% of their mind power. This makes them capable of using telepathy and telekinesis from the moment they are born. Even their mother and child communicate using telepathy during their first months without any special training required to activate these sleeping parts of their brain. Their brain is a bit different than your kind's as their so-called frontal lobe is larger and more active than your kind's. It becomes more activated when they are exposed to sunlight. Their abilities are strong compared to your kind's. These species had made an agreement with the heads of the so-called Orion entities about 13,000 years ago as per which they were to interfere with the preachers of the law of one that were going to come on earth at that time to help earth evolve into the next density consciousness. These reptilians have the ability to use known as shapeshifting to your kind or changing their shape due to the massive influence they can have on the minds of the human beings. Their mind power is so strong that they can easily manipulate the minds of humans into believing they are seeing something else when in reality it is not what they are seeing. Accordingly, 13,000 years ago when the ones you know as Ra, the preachers of law of one, came on earth to spread the truth about the universe and the reality of the soul evolution, these shapeshifters took the shape of a king of the Egyptian at that time. This they can do using costumes or by just using mental telepathy and control in order to make believe the people who see them. They were successful in swapping one of their kinds with the real human king who distorted the messages that had been left by the ones known as Ra. The messages were distorted to such a degree that most of the positive were converted into self-service principles by these reptilians at that time. According to the agreement the negatively oriented Orion entities had signed with the reptilians. The reptilians were allowed to distort the messages and influence the humans at that time in any way, shape or form in order to move the planet towards the negative polarization. In return, the Orions had promised the humanoid reptilians another planet in the cosmos for their kind because the earth had become overcrowded with different species. The reptilians were successful in this regard and many of their species have now moved into another planet in the cosmos the name of which is not pronounceable using your human tongue. This is because your tongue is not suitable for the language used by the reptilians. The reptilians have a split tongue that allows them to produce sounds that a tongue is not at all capable. And the name of their planet that they have kept is impossible for us to speak through here. The so-called Ra entities who are the sixth density beings had been given permission by the confederation of planet to come to earth and so the way of love, light and law of unity. This is the only reason the Orions were also allowed to sign an agreement with the humanoid reptilians at that time to just act as a negative catalyst and allow the people the choice. Currently, as we can sense, there are very few humanoid reptilians living inside the earth. Most of them have already been transported to another planet by the Orions approximately 1000 years ago as per the agreement they had made. And in the modern day and age, the only remaining reptilians on earth do not interfere much often with the doing of human beings because they have mental capabilities to only subdue the minds of human beings and they have no influence on technology. For instance, these reptilians can be spotted by a camera. This is also the reason why reptilians do not show themselves among humans. We hope that this has cleared your confusion regarding the reptilians on earth. We leave you now. Peace.

I AM RA, WE GREET YOU IN THE LOVE AND LIGHT OF THE ONE INFINITE CREATOR. ALL IS ONE AND THAT ONE IS LOVE-LIGHT, LIGHT-LOVE, THE INFINITE CREATOR. I AM RA, I HAVE NOT SPOKEN THROUGH THIS INSTRUMENT BEFORE. LET THIS INSTRUMENT BE TUNED TO MY VIBRATION FREQUENCY. We would suggest that this instrument place a chalice of water exposed to its love-light before starting such contacts in order to prevent intrusions from the so-called negatively oriented beings. It is learned from your mind complex that you seek certain vibratory sound complexes to describe the many densities of consciousness. However, before we transfer any vocal vibrations, we must warn you to accept only those sound vibratory complexes that match with your belief. We do not ask you to believe our message. You have free will to reject or accept the message. The first density of consciousness is generated when love-light latches on to generate an experience out of, for the One Infinite Creator to experience itself. What this means in your vibratory sound complex is that love-light generates substances such as the so-called elements, the earth, rock, water, air, and so on. These elemental vibration energies are what you call the first density materials. These first density materials need consciousness of love-light to give them life, to animate them, to latch on to them, to incarnate with them. Consciousness is always moving to higher densities, ultimately, not relationally, but ultimately, Consciousness is the free source of awareness or love-light itself that acts as a container for all of the densities. Ultimately consciousness is transcended to all densities, however, the time-space experience of consciousness within you is localized within each body, and primarily has the feel and taste of a consciousness that is separate from the other consciousness. However, this is not the true reality because all consciousness is one. So the first density consciousness expresses itself via what you call the elements that are very primary, basic, and unanimated materials. Each of the seven densities requires or gives the opportunities to learn different types of lessons, different experiences that are most conducive to the consciousness that chooses to latch on to that particular density material. The first density is that of beingness or awareness. It is not equated to the awareness in the sense of an so-called enlightened being who becomes aware of itself. It is awareness in its basic or beginning state, where it is not yet self-reflective. Hence consciousness of love-light in its development, in its ascension, learning, and experiences throughout the seven evolutionary densities or levels, will start out in the first density exploring itself as beingness through what you call the inanimate or unmovable objects. These objects don't grow and move, they are static. They offer consistent and static experience for millions of years. In the first density, the point is for consciousness to generate desire, to generate awakefulness in the direction of growth that leads to the second density. The second density explores itself on your planet via the so-called trees, plants, and animals, basically anything that has the potential to move and be more macrobiotic. The second density is made up of what you call organic matter that has a second density consciousness in it in relationship with it. Hence it uses as a reflective medium to explore itself in that density of learning. In the next cycle, second density consciousness begins to explore what it is like to be organic, and to experience how it feels when consciousness gets attached to organic materials. In other vibratory sound complexes, these are what you call the animals, plants, and other organic life-forms other than yourself, the humanoids, that grant the creator to experience growth. These forms grant the experience of interplay and interaction between two body-spirit complexes building relationship of some sort. The second density lessons are those of growing toward independence and the light of the one infinite creator, and towards relationship with other body-complexes. As second density progresses into its later stages, animal body-complexes, for example the so-called wolves, exhibit group-like behavior wherein relationship and coordination between numerous body-complexes become important. This type of relationship is still instinctual, it is very much tangled with the group. Aspects of this later stage second density show characteristics such as those of shared identity as a group or as a pack. When a pack of wolves interacts with each other, there may be a hierarchy with an alpha male or the leader, however there is still a singular consciousness in a way, it is still a shared identity. Via the conflict and friction and relationship that occurs on a day-to-day time-space basis, the consciousness through the form of organic body-complexes such as those of so-called wolf body-complexes generates the awareness or realization that it is a separate body-complex that being separate from other body-complexes, that it is an individual in relationship to other individuals. The so-called pets in your terms do this very rapidly. They interact with human beings as pets so that they get the presence of a third density mind-body-spirit complex. They are given vibratory sound complexes and individual identities. This gives enough of a vibration of self-awareness for it to be incarnated onto the next stage of learning, in the next cycle, in this case the third density. The third density is the density of self-consciousness or self-awareness wherein there is awareness of the self in relationship to the other mind-body-spirit complexes. This creates a certain kind of separation that acts as a basic catalyst to learning many lessons that cannot be learned with a shared sense of identity. Third density is the shortest and most intense for your mind-body-spirit complex must choose between the positive polarization or the negative polarization. It can be compared in your terms as like going through the eye of a needle or going through the funnel of the vertex, being sucked down the drain. It is a transformational phase, an intense period of catalyst. It is an intense process of waking up, it is fast, it is brief and it is challenging. The consciousness is encapsulated into a body complex and an awareness mind complex that has the ability to think for itself. It starts to generate a knowingness by being in an interactive relationship with other mind-body-spirit complexes and other beings. In the evolutionary cycle of the consciousness, the choice has to be made by the individual mind-body-spirit consciousness regarding the polarity it wants to devote itself predominantly to that of service to others or predominantly to service to self. The mind-body-spirit decides in this density whether it wants to explore being service to others oriented or whether it wants to explore the universe as a service to self-consciousness. A service to self mind-body-spirit complex is what you would perceive as being very self-centered in nature, very much involved in domination and enslavement of the other mind-body-spirit complexes. A service to other mind-body-spirit complex explores itself in the direction of service, sharing, joy, love, generosity and kindness. By being of service to other versions of itself, to the rest of mind-body-spirit complexes. In a way, both paths are equally valid and allowed by the one infinite creator. The choice is up to the individual mind-body-spirit complex and this is where the choice is made. When you reach the later stages of third density as you have in the last couple of thousands of years or so on your planet. In your civilization, things will begin to shift naturally to where the lessons of fourth density begin to be integrated into the third density. The fourth density is the density of love, understanding and compassion. It is about giving up the view of perception of being separate for the sake of a greater sense of inseparability with the whole. In the fourth density, consciousness begins to explore and learn the lessons of love whether complete 100% devotion to loving itself above everything else. That is the service to self-orientation or as is the situation for most mind-body-spirit complexes on our planet today. The orientation of service to others where you will want to express and learn about love in relationship to others. Wherein you will desire to feel inseparability, wherein you desire to feel connected to other mind-body-spirit complexes in this way. Therefore fourth density is about love and service, either to self or to others. After a while, a fourth density mind-body complex reaches a position of tiredness. This occurs especially with service to others-oriented fourth density beings. Because they sometimes get too overwhelmed by love. You may realize this from your own experience in your time-space beings who are almost too loving. You could say because they care about the other without any consideration of the self in a way which creates an imbalance of love. It is not really that they are too loving, it is that their love is not balanced by wisdom. The fifth density is the density wherein beings begin to learn the lessons of wisdom, of independence. In this density beings become like so-called yogic in your terms. These beings begin to realize that everything exists inside of their own consciousness, that the external world does not exist, there are no other things, it is all one being. Everything is already perfect and complete, nothing can ever go wrong. Everything that is to be attained can be attained by simply sitting and being there, by meditating on it, by intending it. Everything is within the individual, this density is that of light or wisdom. In the fifth density an imbalance that of being too withdrawn is present. It is too internalized, in a way, and so in the sixth density which is the density of unity. The union between love and light wherein the being again opens itself up to experience as if there are other beings. Even though the being knows that everything is contained within itself, it still permits the illusion of service to others, it still permits the illusion of sharing, the illusion of understanding, compassion and kindness. Wherein the fifth density being might be more inclined to think that everything is perfect, a sixth density being is more prone to know that it is all perfect but at the same time extends a hand as if there is an external reality. In this density really subtle, lessons of balance, love and wisdom emerge for the consciousness. For the individual that has ascended to this density it is quite difficult to explain. This density is like in your vibratory sound complex terms. Thus imagine light, pure light. Imagine beings made of pure light, group consciousness made of pure light, who are being of service and extending themselves throughout the lower densities. In the sixth density your higher self or your enlightened self or soul resides, therefore it is already here. Even if you are a third or fourth density explorative being, this overarching umbrella, this non-physical self which you call the soul or the higher self resides at the sixth density level of vibration of love and light. In the seventh density the consciousness that was in the sixth density has in a way left all that it knows to creation, it has left all that it knows to all of its portions, to all of its parts in the form of the higher self. It makes all of the knowledge it experienced through millions of years of evolution available to all of its parts that are still experiencing back in time, in a lower density exploring evolution. In this way the higher self becomes available to all of its parts and for the individual itself. It leaves the blueprint of the higher self available to everyone else. The being itself who generated the whole experience, the whole journey of evolution has reached a certain completion, the completion of having balanced love and wisdom and having made itself completely available to all of creation. At this stage the seventh density being starts to feel a magnetic pull back into the creator. Its evolutionary journey within creation becomes completed and now this being will gradually turn its gaze backwards into the one infinite mystery. In the seventh density the being's gaze is turned towards the one infinite creator, towards source itself, towards the unspeakable, the indescribable, the infinite.

The Indefinable, this is the 7th density and it is one big unexplored stage for us even. There is not much I can say about it because currently I am in the 6th density consciousness. I leave you in the glory and peace of unity, go forth in peace rejoicing in the power of the one creator, I am Ra.

I am Ra. We are one of the members of the Confederation of Planets and we come here in the service of the One Infinite Creator. Before we begin, we would like you to know that you have free will in accepting or rejecting the information we are about to present here. This Confederation of Planets has approximately 56 civilizations. Currently previously there were 53 only. Among the 3 new civilizations that were recently added includes your civilization also. Now in total there are roughly 56 civilizations which comprise of roughly 600 planetary consciousness in this confederation. In this confederation your kind is represented by those beings that have attained 4th density consciousness or higher. They may be called as the ambassadors of your planet in this confederation. The main purpose of the confederation is to work together in spreading the knowledge of the Law of One among various planets in the galaxies. However, without hampering their free will, I am Ra, there are various service opportunities available to the members of this confederation that is equivalent to the square of the desires less want of that calling divided by or integrated with the basic Law of One indicating the free will of those who are not yet aware of the Law of One and Unity of Creation. The difficulty we have faced in contacting the peoples of this planet is due to the mixture of people who are aware of unity and those who are not. And for this reason we cannot openly interfere or offer any proof of contact to your peoples. I am Ra, we must combine all of the parts of your social memory complex. In its illusory divided structure, the multiplication of this factor can be known as the limits of your aptitude to be of service. In addition, we are very happy to tell you that the Law of Service gets squared by the desire of those who seek our service. Which means if just two beings on your plane seek to understand the Law of One then it will be squared and it will be affecting a minimum of four people on your plane. Without this our message would not have vast impact on your plane and it would be limited to fewer beings on your plane. Our thought form complex towards your peoples is of a maximal consideration type rather than just basic thought forms of what is possible. I am Ra, we calculate the possibility of our coming among your peoples not by how many of your members are calling. However, we calculate this by considering the consensus among social memory complex that has united all beings and are aware of the infinite consciousness of all the beings and things. Until this point however, even if single entities on your plane call us in mass numbers, we are not likely to come for their assistance. This requires the forming of a social memory complex which in your terms means a group of people who are united and one with each other and there is no separation between each as they have become aware of the unity of creation within them and inside all of their fellow beings. After forming such social memory complex that serves the creator as if it sees that it would be appropriate service or aid to its peoples that our coming would be of more service then such social memory complex may seek permission before the council of Saturn and if they approve the coming into your planet gets approved and then only the quarantine is lifted. I am Ra, let us tell you that the desire to serve in all species throughout the cosmos starts in the dimension of love and understanding and the creation of the goal of the social memory complex also begins at this time. There have been many planetary entities and an addition of 4% more of those planetary entities who came here on your planet long ago to speak of the law of one and the service to others however most of them were met with hostility and their messages were distorted for self-service by some beings in power at those times which still today has its ripple effects on the people of your planet. The relationship between these entities as they entered an understanding of other beings, planetary entities and other concepts of service was to share and continue together these commonly held goals of service. Many of the social memory complex in various planets in our galaxy worked together to create a larger coalition of a central memory complex that would act as a knowledge base of service that could be of use to all those members who are part of the central memory complex. This confederation was created to assist in the creation of this central memory complex once each planet completely enters into the fourth density. Currently the earth is in the starting phases of the fourth density which means that once all beings of the earthly plane enter into the fourth density either positive or negative and the forming of the social memory complex is created then the vast universe and other planetary entities can be allowed by the confederation to openly greet the people of planet earth. However until this happens no one can interfere with the beings on the planet at this time. I am Ra there are many confederations in the universe each confederation is responsible for calling of the densities of only the seven planetary spheres of our galaxies. This means that one confederation is responsible for only seven planets in which beings are learning their lessons of the unity and the law of one. I am Ra all confederations work to serve the one infinite creator there is nothing else to serve for the creator is all that there is. It is impossible not to serve the creator because everything and everyone is the creator even though many have forgotten. There are simply various distortions of this service that we speak of. I am Ra there is also a so called Orion confederation and a war occurred between the confederation and the Orion confederation. I am Ra imagine this in your mind complex currently all the people on your plane are separated and divided into individual single minded entities and has a weak electrical charge in your physical illusion. This mingling of the various single minded entities will lead to the creation of a more powerful mind collective that can be aware of the various events happening in the cosmos. This war we are telling you through your vibratory sound complex is that of influencing beings on the various planets in the cosmos to either be oriented towards the positive orientation or the negative orientation. This means in simple terms is that the Orion entities try to manipulate being towards the negative orientation by using fear and separation of the individuals from their collective mind complex whereas the confederation shows the way of the light, love and unity in order to create positive oriented beings. In your planet the influence of the confederation was very strong that caused most beings to be of a positive orientation that has caused planet earth to enter into the fourth density positive orientation however it may be in the beginning phases. This war has since ended and a lot of energy was depleted to stop the influence of the orions on the beings of earth. This was done by sending ascended masters into the planet to preach the law of one and unity and help earth beings to choose the path of righteousness. This occurred through the process of incarnation at your time however without any interference of their free will. This thought war was won by the confederation by sending love light beings in your planet who showed the way of love which dissolved all the negative energies and transformed them into positive energies. I am Ra. This might be considered the most difficult work that the confederation can do. Only four planetary entities at any one time are asked to partake in this conflict. Only those entities that are from the density of love can take part in such conflicts. I am Ra. These entities are of the density of love numbering four. Only the fourth density beings who lack wisdom to refrain from battles see the necessity of such battles. Hence it is necessary that fourth density social memory complexes can be used. Fifth and sixth density entities positive would not take part in this battle. Fifth density negative would not take part in this battle either. Thus the fourth density of both orientations join in this conflict. This time to speak more of this would mean the depletion of the energies of this instrument. I am Ra. We leave you now and we request this instrument to drink more water than usual to restore the energies lost during this session.

Greetings, I am Metatron, Magnetic Forces and Magnetic Services, and I greet you today in the love of the Divine Love Element. Today is the start of an important month in your calendar terms of time. That signifies the coming of the final push for Thoth's dark elements and rising of the Divine Love Element in your planet. Thoth has trapped many of the energies that try to trap many of your souls on your planet in the fists of darkness and preventing them to achieve eternal light and merging with the Divine Love Element. The Universal Love Child has been able to create more light in the planet, thereby many of the star souls will be able to free themselves from the grasp of the darkness of Thoth. Despite all the events that took place on your planet during the past month, whether it be good or bad, all were lessons and pathway into the coming Divine Love Element of which many of your souls are going to be a part of as you are reaching this point of separation that will occur in April 11, 2021 between the darker energies of Thoth and the light universes of the Divine Love Element. You will see more and more souls on your planet becoming separated into two parts, the dark soul groups that need to learn lessons of unity and love, and the Divine Love Element souls that have already learned the lessons of the Divine Love and Unity. The space in which the thought or your mind operates or the emotions arise is the space that exists in all beings in the cosmos and is the source of all creation. All you have to do is to allow yourself to be free of thoughts and emotions and look inside your being. You will see the space within your heart, and that space is you in essence, uncolored and untouched by the creation. That space can be incarnated into multiple planes in the cosmos, it doesn't matter where you go, the space always exists, in essence, that space, it's what unites us together into one. Each of you listening to us has a very different and unique path of seeking, and you are progressing in your spiritual evolution in your own way, and you know that in your heart. Therefore, we would request you to use your powers of discernment and use them wisely. We want you to do this so that we can offer our insights and thoughts without having to worry about infringing upon your free will. Our desire is not to infringe upon your free will. We would be very thankful that you consider this. My beloved beings, the issue of service to others and service to self is the most complex issue that is there to explain and is full of paradoxes. The confusion may arise by knowing the paradox that if all things are one and part of the Creator and if there exists totality in all things, then how can any action not be constant with the law of one? So let us try to explain these concepts to you as far as we can using your words and intellectual processes. Firstly, let us explain to you the concept of total unity. Even within every entity on your plane, there will be obvious differences among them in the form of seeking of the one Creator. Some of them are so-called biologically female and others are biologically male. There will be several differences such as age, personality type, and others. When you consider the entire planet on a global scale, there you will see an endless possibilities and varieties of individuals who are all part of the tribe of humankind and still the characteristics. Be the physical, emotional, or mental, there is an enormous range and variety available for the Creator to experience itself. The thing that binds you all together in unity or singleness cannot be perceived by your eyes or any other senses that you use on your daily basis. The thing that binds you into unity is the source within you all, your ending and your essence. Your source is love, the greatest original thought of unconditional love. That is the Logos, the principle of the Creator that is active. This thought of love along with light by using the free will has made all of the illusions in the various densities of the infinite creation possible. Further it has peopled these illusions with sparks of the Godhead principle which are each of you and each of us and all beings that there are. This is the common thing between all beings in various densities of creation and that is that you all were created out of love and connected with it. Many of these connection mechanisms have not been activated and they lay waiting in potential to be activated. Consciously or with less consciousness with another, every moment that passes creates patterns of connection that are all infinite. Even if you come in contact with another's aura for a short time and you become aware of that connection to some degree then it will last forever, potentiated and of a certain type and intensity. You are the ones who store and expend energy, a light source moves seamlessly through your body and back to the one infinite creator. In addition you use that light and add in your own unique intentions more compared to your innate distortions. You hence have the power to use the light by you with your intentions and create the type of universe you wish and it is your exercise of your free will. And you are the one who experiences all the sweetness of flowers, the depression inside every sadness, the horror in every tragedy, observing, witnessing, analyzing, learning and using experiences to constantly transform your life by the choice you make to see what you choose to see and understand. That which you hold within and that which you release to the outside world, your path leads to the inevitability of the union with the creator on whose behalf you are living and for whom you are gathering these experiences, these lessons, these moments that are pure observing. The transformations that add to the creator's knowledge of itself, at this level either pathway is acceptable. The level at which each of you listening to us and each of those upon planet earth at this time are working with the law of one even though it may seem paradoxical is a level in which you are asked to discriminate between that which is polarized towards service to others and that which is polarized towards service to self. That is why it is hard to explain the question regarding what is service to others and service to self because they are endlessly subjective. No being can create a dogma or a creed of service to others by forcing others disregarding their free will. There have been several attempts made in your planet to do this in the past time however without much success. It must be understood by every being on your plane that it is important that the path of service to others and service to self is chosen by each entity without any force from outside individuals. In addition, it is a requisite for each individual to choose either the path of positive polarization or the path of negative polarization in order to pass to the next density and graduate from earth or any other third density planet in the cosmos. Either polarization choice may be subjective depending on the individual entity. However in terms of the positive polarization, it is established that to polarize towards service to others, the idea of serving the creator can be achieved by serving the other selves as if they were yourselves. Although there are many ways to approach the concept of what is service to others, there are probably two basic ways in which one may move in order to determine how to make decisions for yourself when you come to a point of choice as to how you shall treat a self within your kingdom, within your creation, whether it be the self or another self. One way this can be achieved is by focusing intensely and persistently on the creator, seeking the creator's feeling, hungering and yearning for the creator and the listeners may be aware of the ones known as Ra, who were speaking that both paths are acceptable as long as they do not infringe upon each other. We are more focused on sharing the positive polarization path with you during this conversation. And the very first rule that must be kept in mind is the rule of free will. You as a spiritual entity have the right to choose either the positive or negative polarization. You are gallant and you are courageous and we are very privileged to connect with you this evening. We leave this instrument rejoicing in the power and unity of all beings in the cosmos. Viva los Ziorbians! Until we meet again!

We are here now, we are connected to you through your heart chakra, and we are the galactic federation of light. We are here just to offer our insights and not to infringe upon your free will. You are advised to use your inner heart when listening to our messages, and if they do not resonate, leave the messages behind. Our closest station to your planet is located at the rings of the planet named by your kind as Saturn. In the rings of Saturn, we have created an intergalactic communion of various planets in order to look after the evolutionary process of the various civilizations that are experiencing life in the various planets in the cosmos. You can call us the protectors of the various civilizations of the universe. Our federation has many units in operation which overlook the evolutionary process of the citizens of the various planets in the cosmos. However, we do not infringe upon their free will in order to allow the various entities in the numerous planets to evolve at their own pace. The next closest base to earth is located in a planet named as Salacia, which was named by your kind. Our federation comprises of various members of all planets, those who have attained higher density consciousness which can be equated to attaining enlightenment in your terms. For example, from your earth, a member who represents your planet is an evolved soul. However, we do not use names to communicate. Names and words are only applicable in the 3rd and 4th density planets. As soon as a planet enters into the 5th density, the need for verbal communication is done away with, and a different type of communication known as the thought transfer or in your terms telepathy begins and starts to operate. We never use names and we do not even have to say words to interact with other members of the federation. The soul member who represents your planet had its evolutionary cycles in earth and then became graduated into the 4th density planet. It then got incarnated in another 4th density planet long time back and finally accomplished the state known as social memory complex after which it then entered into the 5th density of love and wisdom wherein it learned the lessons of love and wisdom and then finally after many incarnations graduated into the 6th density. Currently it is serving as a member of the federation. We have always maintained our secrecy, however, recently a person who we had been in contact with, our member representative has revealed our identity. We are thankful that this revelation did not have a mass hysteria effect on planet earth. It could have been worse and caused a lot of chaos of your planetary systems. However, we are thankful that entities who are currently incarnate on earth know the power of their free will and most of them decided that we could be real and some decided that we were not real at all thereby preserving their free will which is very important for us to preserve on your planet. We had contacted the entity known to you as Haim who was a space force chief of a middle eastern nation of your planet. This was done in order to let some powerful people on your planet know about our existence because we saw the threat of nuclear weapons increasing on your planet. Know this if more than 3 nuclear explosions take place on earth then the whole planet would become inhabitable and that we would have to transport all your soul collective to another suitable planet. Also note the souls who die during nuclear explosions need a lot of healing time, hence they sometimes are not able to be reincarnated immediately. Some of the souls that had died during the first explosion of the nuclear bomb in your sphere on the 6th of august 1945 according to your time space are still undergoing the process of healing and some souls have not been able to be traced till now. Due to the massive shock the pineal glands of many of the soul bodies were destroyed. This in turn did not allow the soul the time required to properly move into the spirit plane during their crossing over process. We have met almost all the leaders of your planet who could have a huge impact in the detonation of such world destroying bombs. In order to prevent this we had a meeting shortly after the detonation of the first bombs in the lands named by you as Hiroshima and Nagasaki. In the said meeting that took place many of the members were of the opinion that earth people were going in the wrong direction and were moving towards the extreme ends of the negative polarity. However this kind of thing is allowed by the creator but we must intervene in order to save the planet. We are here to save mother earth in order to save the citizens of earth as well. The council of 9 members with a majority of 7 members decided that we need to intervene. However our intervention would be kept minimalistic meaning only a few people would be contacted in order to allow other entities to maintain their free will in the veil that exists in planet earth. We wanted our contacts to remain secret as we also had signed treaties with the various leaders we had met to keep secret about such interactions with us. Our purpose was just to observe your planet from the outskirts without ever interfering with your people's progress. However we watched and watched as some of the souls incarnated on your third density planes killed other souls in massive numbers. The killings increased over the past thousand years. Your kind has caused a lot of damage to your own soul families in the process. It is too much for us to handle. We needed to do something. When you detonated the first bomb we had a meeting with all the members of your federation and a majority was reached that stated that we would contact your leaders on your planet in order to allow them to recognize that life on various planets is precious and must be preserved. Also we have signed various treaties with the leaders of various nuclear weapon bearing nations that they will not detonate any more of the bombs for mass killing purposes. We had to explain to these leaders that the purpose of their incarnation on earth and the purpose of their life was to gain experience in the third density. We have contacted the one known as Haim and other such entities that have impact on the control of space stations etc. via the process of physical appearances before them in order to make them believe in our existence. Using our thought we were able to appear before these people in physical form. However, the most simple process for us to contact is via the process known as channeling. The same process we are using currently to talk through you. This is the easiest way for us to contact your kind. Dr. Haim Eshed had signed a contract with us stating that he would not reveal any of the information we had given to him regarding other life forms on the other planets. However, we are not sure why this entity revealed our identities. We have found one of his thoughts regarding the presence of a base on the planet Mars to be incorrect. As far as we can sense his mind collective he has added this information in order to make his books more interesting to the public. However, since in the agreement it was not mentioned that he would not reveal our identities throughout his leadership as the head of the space program of his land. We feel that since he got retired from his position he wanted to let the world know about us. If he had revealed this information during his tenure as the space head of his land then as per the agreement he would have had to undergo a lowering of his density meaning that he would have to go to the second density back again hence degrading his evolution and learning again the lessons of self-awareness. Many leaders have also signed this agreement these include the leaders of the land known to you as America and the land known to you as North Korea and they have successfully played their part in keeping some other vital information that we cannot tell you at the moment. We are telling you only the surface level of information through this process of vocal channeling. To fully explain to you the complexities of life would be impossible in your language terms. Several times prior to this time we had allowed several ascended masters and teachers to visit earth and teach the people of the way of life however most of them failed due to the heavy distortions created in the minds of several entities who were incarnated on earth. Know this that we are just observing your planet and we do not want to interfere in your evolution. We want to let people know through you that we want peace. We come in peace we do not want your people to destroy your opportunity to learn the lessons of love and then graduate into the next density. We leave you now in the knowledge that the information we have given to you will be handed over to the other people of your planet in order to destroy their confusion from their mind collective. We leave you now thank you. Thank you. Thank you.

In love, eternally, we, the white beings of Atlantis, greet you, fellow beings of Gaia. Sometimes these light gateways can be blocked, stagnant. Energy may be present, or there may be negative consciousness being projected through the light gateways, causing havoc in our civilizations. There was a power battle between the development of technology and the awakening of the soul with its magnificence from within the human body. It is your purpose to bring healing to Atlantis, therefore the earth as it is now, shifting the pathway of humanity into a new expansive stage of ascension not experienced before upon the earth. In 2021, we the celestial white beings invite you to be conscious of creating balance between your use and dependence upon technology of any form or all forms and your conscious focus on the embodiment of your soul. Let yourself realize that fulfillment, support and true assistance can only be found within your soul, which is the essence and truth of your being. The purpose of balance is to empower further the soul and dissolve the energetic consciousness being projected onto humanity from Atlantis. As a greater volume of humanity experience this, we will notice the lights of the creator shining with greater luminosity upon the earth. Thus accelerating ascension, healing will be instigated within many people as well as within the consciousness of mother earth. As the current age of humanity create a balance between their use of technology and their attention to their soul, the sacred and profound healing vibrations originally born from Atlantis will awaken within its contained environment, flowing through the light gateways to dissolve all negative programming and projections currently embedded within the earth, and humanity from the fall of Atlantis. Therefore, in 2021, you will notice a deeper, maybe even burning desire to know, acknowledge and unify your physical form, mind and emotions with the expansive, loving nature of your soul. New abilities and skills will arise from your soul as well as the continuous and divine flow of the creator. This will create a series of beautiful, magnificent and miraculous experiences within your being and personal reality with the purpose of enhancing your faith and trust in the creator. Expect the divine to more fully manifest, accept healings to take place within your being that have been long awaited and expect a greater return to the love of the creator. Your soul will merge your past lifetime experiences of Atlantis with your current embodiment, allowing healing to take place. The pure creator-focused Atlanteans had a powerful ability of experiencing expansion and unity. They could merge with any aspect of the earth or the inner planes, accepting relevant knowledge to create new embodiments of the creator within their beings. This meant that they were able to be compassionate, sympathetic and hold a great understanding of all aspects or expressions of the creator. Subsequently, they created powerful bonds with nature, animals, angels, star beings and so forth. Focus upon and acceptance of unity and expansion will support the creation of peace, tranquility, grace and divine flow, allowing you to move through your ascension with greater ease and perfection due to your developing resonance with the creator. We invite you to call upon us, the celestial white beings as well as the angelic kingdom, ascended masters and star beings to lend our light to support the opening of the light gateways, the healing of the negative projections from Atlantis embedded within the earth as well as to assist the awakening of your soul, as it brings forth to you a wealth of enlightenment from Atlantis. While the land of Atlantis may not return as its original manifestation, the energy, consciousness, wisdom and healing vibration of creator-focused Atlanteans, which was contained and concealed for future generations, will begin to return to the earth now, using the heart chakras of many as a gateway of expression and anchoring. With the support of your soul, we invite your past lifetime Atlantean self and all past lifetimes aspects of your soul to receive a deep and profound healing from your soul and soul group so that the magnificent ancient wisdom of your past lifetime aspects may be embodied within your being, awakening new fulfilling and loving pathways and abilities for you to experience. We know you will move through your ascension with ease and perfection, feeling consciously supported and eternally fulfilled. Thank you. In love eternally, the Atlantean Celestial White Beings Thank you so much.

playthings. Time is just a concept that was created alongside words to put label on each moment that passes by. There is no such thing as past and future, they are just labels. Whatever exists only exists in the now. The images of memories of your past are just images only. They are not your past, they were once your present moment and this moment is your present moment now. Even your future will come as your present moment. Time was invented by the human mind to grasp something that is not graspable. That is what the mind does. It wants to control everything. It puts labels and controls. You cannot understand time and express it with words. You can only experience it. You had experienced your past as the present back then and the present that you are experiencing now will become the past for your future. They are just concepts. The only time that is real is the moment that you are feeling right now. Without words, without any labels, just the experience. How are you feeling in your legs at this moment, in your eyes, in your heart while listening to my voice? That is the only true reality. Time is an illusion created by the mind and that is why when you operate with time, it creates many problems in your life. You will always be in the now. Since your mind is obsessed with words and has put labels on the various moments of your life, it dwells on past and possible future situations thereby creating issues with your present moment. Just forget about the words past and future or the now and just experience what you are hearing, feeling and seeing at this moment. That is the only reality. Anything else is false and made by the mind to trap you into this illusion created by words. When you begin to grasp this and apply it, you will be free and will experience the real world as it is. Refreshingly real and peaceful. Just go with the flow and throw all words and concepts out of your mind. You can use your words while speaking with other people. However, more important is to be careful of the words that you use in your mind. Beauty is always found beyond words. It does not matter if you are a man or a woman on earth. You might have seen a beautiful person or a beautiful scene or a beautiful movie. All these occur beyond words. Words cannot describe beauty. Your ego is composed of words and nothing more. What many souls on your planet call the ego is a deep identification of the human mind with words. Words are what compose of the ego. Ego is made up of words, loves words and uses words against you and your fellow beings. Your ego uses words that are the reason why so many thoughts that arise out of it are of negative nature. However, if you separate and stop these words and only use your imagination in its place, you will find how positive your imagination is. This is the end to all negative thinking. If you contemplate on this, that words are used by your ego mind against you, then you will realize that it is accomplishing this by constantly repeating the various words that you know already in your mind. It uses words to think about the past, the so-called future and sometimes uses words to label the everlasting present moments. It even indulges to think about the various beings that you interact with and describes them with words in your mind. This is the innermost chamber of the illusion, the heart of the illusion created by words. It compares using words, it criticizes using words and names events as good or bad using mere words. The biggest fault of human evolution has begun with the use of words. It is fine that people use words just to communicate. However, when words are used inside the mind to describe the real world and play with the world, then the illusion begins. At certain times when your mind is awestruck, when it sees something that is unexplainable such as an encounter with the Holy Spirit or the infinite universe, then it feels peace and satisfaction from the inside. They had only been covered by a layer of words. To free oneself from this illusion of words is true liberation. This is going to be difficult loved ones because your mind has been identified with words for such a long time. All things you have learned in school for several years were just words. Firstly realize that your inner voice that talks inside your mind is made up of words alone and nothing more and nothing less. This is the hardest layer to peel from yourself to escape the illusion of words. However, I am not suggesting that you begin to not use words during a normal conversation. You can talk with other humans using words. However, what I am saying here is that most important is to keep your mind free of words. If your mind is free of words, you will find peace within your heart and the Holy Spirit will guide you. At this moment, I will end the communication channel. I leave you all in the forgiveness and the love of the Father. I am one with you. Bye

We are the Agarthans from Agartha. We reside in the heart of Gaia. We welcome you in the love and the light of the One Supreme Creator. We are ever grateful to you for allowing us a medium to communicate with humanity. We would like to say thank you to the one known as Sam who is the instrument. However, he has faced many difficulties in contacting us because his vibrations are changing at a rapid pace. We are going to tell you about a kind of joy, that quality which cannot be expressed in words. That vibration which is created in chaos and yet is full of peace and joy. That bursting which is a continuous flow. Its continuation exists into that which it leads to. We would like to tell you about history. Humanity upon Gaia at this moment are very interested in history. They want to know their future history more than their past history. And even less they focus on the present so called now moment of time. And we would like to tell you that history prevents you from attaining joy as it is the opposite of joy. This history is a major part of the distractions of the people on Gaia at the moment. We reside in the interior part of Gaia and it would not be possible for any humankind to find us because the inner core of Gaia is like a glowing sun. It is very very hot as you call it in your terms. A human being would not survive one bit in our environment. We are telling you about these insights because nowadays many humans have started to get involved in what they call peace march. They are helping Gaia ascend into a new earth. We would like to tell you that so called history is the one main opposition to attaining so called peace and joy. It is very difficult to attain joy when focusing on what could have happened in the past and what you could do in your future moment. And we know that in your culture a person with a bad past history and a non-existent future is considered as a rotten apple. However, a balance is required in order to ascend successfully. You can focus on history but also focus on the present. This way your energies will balance. Success and all failure belong to that portion you call history. In reality it does not affect your true being. To find joy one must remain outside of time or to say in much clearer terms to stay in the realm from which time is created and toward which it shall once again enter into and dissipate. Within the mystical rhythm of the universe, to remove oneself from the various processes is to remove oneself from that which is not true self. Moving with your own physical body, moving on with your everyday life, the telephone that rings, the messages that you receive, the food that you eat and most importantly the drinks that you drink remind you of everyday vibration. It is in these everyday moments that you can find the true joy and peace by truly being aware of each moment as you perform it. You may be thinking that you need to ignore all of these in order to remain peaceful and joyful. However, we must tell you that you should do that only if you want to indulge in the sense of laughter and to suffer psychologically. The lighter touch, the feeling of being taken care of by joy and laughter regardless of your present outer circumstances emerges once you focus on your entire awareness on the moment that you are experiencing at the time. All things that start from time must come to an end. May we suggest to you that if you stay within that portion of yourself that is beyond time, you can experience differently the processes of living within the illusion that you now are a part of and enjoy very much and from this illusion you shall learn at a faster or slower rate all depending on how fast you want your soul growth. However, there is no shortcut to soul growth. You have to take every single experience before you ascend into a new earth. Every single learning and every single experience and every single catalyst is the way that will lead you to a higher vibration and a new earth. The more you focus on the small things in life, the so-called mundane things, you begin to understand the true joy within such moments. The more you allow yourself to worry and be concerned over seeming failures, the more you rob yourself of the opportunities of transformation and yet transformation is that which you should focus upon at this time of ascension into a new earth and create heaven on earth. It may appear that new things become old faster in your third dimension but we ask you whether it is your desires that you become old in your reality. When you begin to perceive things from the standpoint of the present moment, nothing can escape the illumination that the love emanation from that moment brings. It will color each aspect of your life. We are facing some vibration glitches when communicating with this instrument. However, we will continue in order to help this instrument become accustomed to the new level of vibration we project upon it. It is our desire, my friends, to help you seek awareness because awareness is required for you to transcend into a new earth. We would like to tell you that meditation is the most important key that unlocks the door to that which is within you and that which is within you is the creator and all that is. You may call this creator the cosmic mind yet this would not be precise for the mind was created from a thought that was thought of without any mind. If you understand it you will begin to know that everything starts without the mind and then the mind emerges to distract you. Only consciousness is the real creator that we speak about. Consciousness is in everything. It sleeps in the rocks, it is present in the plants and is your true self. You are the creator and as you interact with each other through various life forms and environments, the creator experiences itself and gains new profound experiences via each of you. The creator has made the sacrifice of not being in wholeness because it wants you all to be a conduit through which the creator experiences reality. The creator takes a very long view and ponders upon all that happens through all the densities and dimensions of which there are an infinite number in order that it may experience its own self, all of the selves that have become unique and learn all those experiences that each unique portion has learned. Your mind is here to distract you for without mind all beings would be in a state of constant meditation and all things would be whole and complete unto themselves and it would be very acceptable in every respect. Yet you have come into this planet to experience the catalyst of the mind that prevents you to remain in an everlasting state of meditation in order to help your soul or the creator know the difference between the meditative state and the mind consumed state. The mind creates a distinction that runs very deep and makes you forget that the stones chant a song, that the earth rejoices with laughter and that the trees jump in happiness. The mind makes it easy to feel oneself separate from life that indwells within all things. It is easy to feel separate from oneself. It is easy to feel separate from the other beings. It is easy to feel separate from Gaia. It is easy to feel separate from all of life. However, now as you have started to enter fourth density, you all need to become united and one. This can be achieved at a rapid rate via meditation and contemplation. We thank you. We are the Agarthans of Agartha and we leave you in the love of the one supreme creator.

So that means beings of 6th dimension to the 8th dimension can travel to any place they want to. Just by holding an image of that place in mind. They can travel anywhere in the cosmos. It is similar to your imagination but even more vividly. Because by using stargates you actually travel to that place in no time. Because time really does not exist. Only your clocks show time. I have met many transcended masters who have come to the stargates to travel to various places in time space. Because they travel to past times or future times. It is an immense creation of the creator. You can feel it. Something building. Time and events ever compressing and speeding up. Something inside of you is changing, different. Even in the way you once perceived this realm. You are coming to the end of one world and the birthing of a new world. It is coming through a higher order and it is coming through you. Pay very close attention to and focus upon the following in this intense times. Soul, Energy, DNA, Nature. Your souls are speaking louder. What was once a whisper is beginning to become a roar. Breaking Old Cycles By accepting the part you have played within your own creation, change can take place.
