We are connected now, Beloved. We are the Andromedans and we greet you in the love and in the light of the One Supreme Creator. We are ever thankful that you invited us to speak through you and share our insights on your query. We ask you to, however, use your discernment to test those ideas using your heart, in order that your contributions may be your resources and never your stumbling blocks. If any idea that we present through this instrument does not resonate with your inner beliefs, then you may leave such ideas behind. Our planet is heading toward the formation of a social memory complex that can be considered as the union of a group of separate entities into one. There is no separation in a social memory complex. The query placed by this instrument today regarding whether the so-called neural link that your kind is developing will lead to the creation of a social memory complex or not will be answered in this session today. The so-called neural link, as this entity states, as we can sense from the vibrations of your planet, refers to a so-called company that aims at creating an integration of neurology to science and technology, that will create devices that are supposed to aid in restoring beings with differently abled qualities. The idea behind this new concept in your planet has emerged from the one known to your kind as Elon. This entity desires to explore the areas of serving mankind using the so-called technology. However, anything that has to do with implanting and intruding on your physical vehicle is highly dangerous for your kind, because your physical vehicle is complete as it is and any kind of devices that get implanted in it could lead to a host of problems for your kind in the future, leading to failure of many physical vehicles. This new technology, known as neural link, in essence is being created in order to help those earthly entities that do not have the complete physical vehicle that many of your kind has at the moment. However, it is far from perfect as we can sense it now. The entity named Elon, who is the main creator of this so-called technology, desires to be the first entity on your planet to do such a revolutionary act by creating such an advanced technology by coupling computer science with human physical vehicles. However, at present, we would like to state that this system named neural link needs to be implanted inside the brain of your physical vehicle. This, however, may lead to a host of other problems that are associated with artificial technologies that your kind has developed. Thus, for example, ponder upon the fact that if in the future this system was implanted into each human brain, then the control over other human beings' personal information as well as other relevant information would be available to outside sources such as your so-called elites and other negatively oriented entities who can use it to control mankind. This is not a recommended path for your kind, however, you have free will in this regard. As we must say, this is just our insights. Your kind is interfering with the natural progression of consciousness and by trying to jump too fast, too forward, may lead to a creation of backlog of experiences that need to be re-experienced again. This may hinder in the evolution of interplanetary consciousness based on free will. This type of system may even lead to complete ending of free will of your planet. The question is one that is difficult to grasp, shall we say, organized with as the concept of social memory complex as the ultimate computer is at the same time a wonderful metaphor for what the social memory complex has as its resources and at the same time a guide that is easily misread because the social memory complex is of a transcendentally different nature from that of a computer, no matter how complete the information upon it may seem to be. The first confusing term that we must look at this is the global connection of intelligence that is made available through your so-called internet as this instrument calls this rapidly expanding system wherein large quantities of information can be accessed by any number of people on your planet. This has made the information readily available to any member of your kind making large amounts of information available and there is no need to spend large amounts of time physically moving from different locations searching for materials that one may seek. This device that has been developed by your kind lacks the ability to capture and express emotions, those shadowy concepts that are so deeply a part of the reality that cannot be separated from your living reality, for there is no calculations to emotions. The so-called computer is only able to express using words, numbers and other symbolic notations that are made an integrity with the structure of the computer system. The computer lacks the love elements, the social memory complex is much different than the computer system. When a member of a social memory complex wishes to know something then that intelligence or information is accessed as this instrument calls it, however it is accessed through the heart and through an inner knowing that is like your inner instinct that needs to be awakened within. The social memory complex is the love interconnections that occur between different individuals of a species. Once the ascension process is completed with each member using its free will joins its heart to a larger whole, hence becoming a part of the social memory complex. This insight or intuition as a way of knowing is that which the computer, no matter how sophisticated cannot replicate. The computer and the so-called internet can be used as a means for sharing the information that can assist each of your kind in the process of spiritual evolution, however it will not lead to the formation of a social memory complex as we know it. The computers represent the mind made representation of creating a social memory complex and it is not, however, what the real social memory complex will be composed of. Many other species in the various other planets have merged into their social memory complex via the process of spiritual evolution and not by using such artificial means of assistance as your kind is indulging in. However, the mass interconnections that are made up by the computer systems have offered some beings on your planet a place to belong, a place that does not feel alien. This has also enhanced greatly the capacity of different beings on your planet to make interconnections with one another that the age of information brings. The social memory complex lives and has the soul. No computer or other systems have the same quality of being alive and organic. The transformation of this planetary influence into that grouping of entities that is called the social memory complex of 4th density is a work in progress, shall we say. There are many signposts available. As to the beginning stages of the 4th density, past the period of transformation, we can see that this is likely to occur within the next few hundreds of years at the most, a time that is but a twinkling from our perspective. Also from the point of view of those within your density, this is a time that is variable according to choices being made now by each entity as each becomes more aware of the nature of the illusion and the place within it for each entity. There are subtle changes that are occurring within the fundamentals of your individual consciousness that will lead to a grouping of entities within various cultures, subcultures and movements of thoughts that explore regions of experience that are breakthrough areas as we can sense them. Only the movement of love within each heart has any hope of indicating to entities the nature of this change. Furthermore, such technologies like Neuralink that are being developed can lead to a host of problems for your kind's evolution. Technology is unpredictable and different sinister forces such as the so-called hackers and other negative-focused beings on your planet can use mind-made strategies to gain access to other brain Neuralink systems, thereby causing a lot of damage and unwanted control over other beings on your planet. Neuralink's technology relies mostly on the internet and its services. It is our feeling that your kind should not focus too much on external technological assistance in the process of ascension. Spiritual ascension does not require any technological processes to you in ascending. Ascension can be accessed by going inside and finding your inner truth and connecting with the universal grid. However, we must say that your kind has been given free will by the Creator. This time we leave you. Beloved, Bye.

You can call us the spirit guardians of the death zone. We connect to you in the love and grace of the one supreme creator, peace be with you. We have connected to you and we know that you desire information regarding what you call the afterlife or the transition from life from the third density, that is earth to another incarnation or otherwise. We are most happy that we could contact you through the veil to deliver this vital information of understanding. That means many humans on earth could really reflect on it. However, before we give any information regarding this matter, we would like to clear it to you that you should use your own discernment and free will in accepting what we say. If it does not match your reality, you are free to reject this information. With that out of the way, let us begin now. We are fellow beings just like you, however, we have journeyed through many densities and now are the gatekeepers of the death zone or the death realm. We have found that many humans on earth at the moment have a very distorted understanding of how this reality called evolution of the soul works. During the process of death in your reality, there is a process of ritual and communion in every culture and pouring of emotions for the departed soul. There are two types of death that a being can come across, one known as closed death experience and the other known as full death experience that leads the entity to go into the death zone. But in time-space, things happen in a non-local manner. Generally, when people are about to leave their body, a sharp decrease in their body temperature occurs which signifies the breakage of the connection medium that connects the spirit and the body together. The destruction of this connection medium leads to the separation of the spirit and body and they become detached. It is at this moment that the soul who has just faced death realizes the eternity of the soul. It can see itself and its old costume or the human body. It can also realize that it had been imprisoned with limitations beyond its belief. Compared to what one can do in the spirit realm, your third density experience seems like being fastened with a chain on your neck. There are limitations in your third density experience which get removed once you cross over to the other side. We also know that in your society, most people do not dwell much time in pondering death. They live life as if death would happen to everyone else but to them. However, when they cross over, they are met with a sharp jolt of the truth. When entities see other beings become sick and ready to cross over, they feel the need to ponder upon the thought of death. However, at many times, such thought never crosses their mind. In addition, if a being known to the entity crosses over or dies, then only other entities would value the being's presence with him or her. If you notice this, then you know this happens a lot with people who are well known within your culture. That is, only after they cross over, many people remember who they were and lament their death. It is as if after one has lost a precious gem, it only values the value of the gem. The same applies with life. However, let us tell you all that death is a beautiful experience. It is just the opposite of what people on earth treat it as. It is the freedom of oneself from all the bondages. It is regaining of one's true powers that were bestowed upon each soul by the Creator in order to make the beings into sub-creators of the universe as a means to experience. The Creator wants to experience itself through various creations. Just like a river has got many droplets, but it belongs to the same river. In a similar manner, we are all connected to the one source. We are all one, however, we have been separated into droplets and we have forgotten about it during our 3D experience here on earth. If you had known that death is like a release from a life sentence, you would rejoice it and be happy that your beloved friend or family member is now free to do anything and has regained its true power as a sub-creator. This is what appears to us by looking at your fellow beings. You repent death instead of being happy that the being or entity is now free to go. Like we stated earlier, the two types of deaths that can happen are closed death experience and full death experience. Each experience is different from our vantage point. Firstly, we would like to tell you about closed death experiences. These are those wherein the being's soul is ready to be detached from its body. However, if the body can be recovered and if the soul has not completed its task or mission or its learning experience, then upon death they meet a white light known as their spirit guardian. Everyone on earth has a spirit guardian appointed to them so that the guardian may oversee the growth of the being. However, the guardians can only hint at by providing nudges or intuitions. They are not allowed to directly intervene in a being's growth process because of the factor of free will, which is the most important factor that you need for spiritual growth. Free will was the greatest gift that the creator himself gave to us. All beings in the universe who are a part of the creator have been bestowed upon by a gift of free will to do as they please and to choose the path of righteousness or to choose the path of being negatively oriented, each having its own kind of phase of evolution in the later phases of spiritual development. In a close death experience, however, for the first detachment phase, during which period the brain or the mind complex of a being is still working, it will create illusory worlds and events for it to enter into. That is why so many people quote seeing their spirit deity or their friends and family during this period. It was just created by their mind, much like when we are in deep sleep. It can appear very real, however, it is not the truth. In case of close death experiences, the spirit deity will meet the soul and nudge it to go away from the peace light that shines brighter than the sun. It is so bright that it will blind your third-density eyes if you were to see it right now. This light is the gateway to the spirit realm once an entity crosses over through the light. It cannot go back into its body. The light acts as a healing mechanism. Whatever passes through becomes immediately cleansed and revitalized with all the energy that it had previously had in itself. Even if the body is perfectly fit, the soul cannot re-enter it once it crosses over through the light. Once many a times during close death experiences, the spirit guardian of an entity will appear in the dream of the entity and guide it to go backwards to its body. Even if the entity is desirous of leaving the body behind, the spirit guide can give it a choice of repeating the same kind of life and lessons again or continue the half-completed lessons and finish it at that time. Based on the entity's choice, its spirit guardian proceeds forward. This is the tipping point which separates a close death experience from a full death experience. It is all a choice. However, in some cases, due to sudden accidents or trauma, the body may become unable to host the spirit. Then, in such cases, even if the entity decides to go back, it will be directed by its spirit guides to travel to the light and cross over. Once they cross over, they will be met with similar spirit beings who have also crossed over at the same time. The entity will not be left alone. In the spirit realm, an entity can also decide to travel through space-time to see its previous body and during which time it will see its family and friends lamenting for him or her. There will be guidance from its higher self to undergo a life-review process. It is a process that allows the being to find its mistakes and the lessons it could not learn in its past life that it has just left. It feels like if we talk about the life-review process in this session, we would be depleting this instrument. Hence, until next time, adieu my beloveds.

We enter your vibration in the name of the One Infinite Intelligence. We are the Untarians. Today we are going to tell you about Infinite Memory Bank which many of you know as the Akashic Records or the Hall of Records. Every event that takes place in your reality and all other realities get stored in the Hall of Records. When we say every, we mean even those events that you normally do not think are important to be stored. However, the Creator wants all the experiences to be stored because every experience, coming from different entities with different psychological systems, is unique in terms of the experience for the Creator. The Creator knows that every single experience is unique and cannot be recreated after one ends. The only thing that can be done is to review it, however, to relive the same kind of experience is impossible because there is a factor of free will bestowed upon each entity no matter which density it belongs to. Even if the Creator were to recreate the same entity and the same environment and the same time-space, its experience would vary depending on the choices the entities makes in their incarnations. Hence, you are all very unique sub-creators that are valuable for the Creator to gather experiences. Every single being, no matter how bad or how worrisome your life may seem at the moment, the Creator is gaining experience from you and through you. It is learning about life and how it feels to be a human being. It doesn't matter what you are doing. It doesn't matter where you are. The only thing that matters is to allow the light of the Creator to enter your soul and express itself. Each planetary system and species has a planetary mind or a species mind and each race has a racial mind. We need to make this separation in order to make you understand more. The racial mind and the species mind are designed in the sequence of apparently non-simultaneous considerations that are based upon the freedom of will of the entity of a planetary influence. Consequently, even though this species, planetary or racial mind is indeed a deep part of the root of your mind, the Akashic Records may be seen as different from the deepest parts of your mind. Now you may wonder how the Creator is able to capture all the numerous experiences coming from each entity. This is done through the creation of a space for each entity in the Cosmic Library of the Akashic Records. Your subconscious mind is a recorder and records each event you have experienced in your life and saves it in the Cosmic Library of the Akashic Records with a time-space memory attached to each of it. This is a much similar way in which your so-called computer systems that store data in a particular sector in the hard drive of its memory bank. However, the Akashic Records can be stored in finite simile without running out of database space error like your computers do. It can be said that nature and experiences of a lifetime of an entity can be thought of as a collection, such as a book of record. The pages get studied again and again, re-read and re-experienced in order to learn from the mistakes. And every incarnation leads to new pages in the book of records, which can be added as long as the veil of forgetfulness is in place in various densities of beingness. If the veil of forgetfulness did not exist in your planet, most entities would become conscious of their past incarnation experiences and would be more interested in experiencing new experiences and not the same kind of experiences that it had already experienced before in its many incarnations on earth. This is one of the reasons why the veil of forgetfulness has been put in place on planet earth and many other planets in the third density, because third density is a density of choice, and without the veil of forgetfulness, every single entity incarnating on such planets of third density would be able to make a choice based on their past experiences, and hence in order to prevent such things happening, the creator wanted to experience diversity and to experience the real reality of the choice that each entity would make. There are two types of choices that an entity can make here on the third density, that of positively oriented or negatively oriented, positively oriented being that of service to others, and negatively oriented being that of only service to self. During the process of your life, review, after your incarnation ends, the records of your akashic record book is flipped and every single experience is replayed so that you can learn from it, or solve your karma collectives of the incarnation just left behind. The review process involves every detail of the incarnative experience that you have just completed, and it involves mostly the observing of the self by the self, which is done with the aid of the akashic records of your record book. It is similar to observing a character in the game that has just ended, however it is the same character that is observing itself, much like people on earth, and more like the infants that indulge in playing the so-called video games in your culture, they will be observing themselves in a similar manner once they finish their incarnative experience. In this review process, the self of the entity clearly looks at the behavioral patterns more than the environmental ones, because for the soul, its behavior is of primary importance, especially its behavior with other incarnate souls that were part of its experience on its incarnation in that time-space. The records once stored in the akashic records can be accessed by beings who know how to access them, such as beings of the 5th dimension and higher. This allows such entities to know various experiences from various beings without having to actually experience it again, hence it saves a lot of time in its soul growth because it knows the experience from the akashic records. There are many 5th density souls incarnated in earth at the present time who can access these akashic records during their sleep states or during meditation. However, note that very few individuals are able to access the information in these akashic records because the vibration alignment to access them needs to be that of the 5th density vibration type or higher, which is two stages higher than the vibration of most of the current population that are incarnate on planet earth at the moment. Humanity is vibrating now at the later stages of the 3rd density and the opening phases of the 4th density consciousness. In order to access the akashic records, one must learn how to access the vibrations of the 5th density or higher vibration type. In order to gain access to the akashic records, which allows itself knowledge from the various databases of the records that have been collected throughout eternity, the akashic records hold all the information that are ever available in the world. It is much like your internet but in a cosmic level, all the information that you ever wanted to know about anything or anyone can be found through the akashic records. And as far as we know, many beings who were already on planet earth before 100 or 200 years of your time space learned how to access the records and some of them became renowned leaders and renowned scientists, inventing impossible things and impossible items that you consider were impossible to be invented at that particular time space. The akashic records are so powerful that a being with access to those records can have enormous knowledge of anything or anyone it desires to get. It is much like getting access to the internet of the universe. The universe has its divine power in the akashic records and it gives its power through the akashic records to the people or the beings who know how to utilize it. We leave you now in the vibration of the one infinite intelligence. Love to you.

We are the Pandorians. We connect with you in the love and in the light of the one supreme intelligence. We are connected to be of service to the supreme intelligence. We are ever grateful to be called upon by you and are rejoicing to be a part of your inspiration to seek the one supreme intelligence. It is our pleasure to tell you our insights on the so-called angels by your kind. In order to begin we would like to inform you that you must take responsibility of your mind and only accept the information that matches with your inner being and reject those that do not resonate with your heart. Please be conscious of whether or not you find our insights interesting. We are ever grateful that you will consider this when listening to our messages. Before we tell you about the so-called angels by your kind, it would be better to start talking about your kind. We will also talk about ourselves because we also have been through the third density. We also have been sent by the one supreme intelligence to experience many different things and gather that information that interests us and seek what we desire. We may appear separated and feel the distance between ourselves as separate and the one infinite intelligence to be separate from us. But know this in your heart that we are one. There is no separation in reality. Outer distance makes less of a difference to one's feeling than the inner distance. And we often have felt very much apart from the one infinite intelligence and from other selves who are our own selves in reality, separated by only time and space. This is a challenge that is offered to each of you and to us for being a part of the one infinite intelligence. During your incarnation cycle, my friends, you will deal with a strong veil of forgetfulness that is hard to penetrate in the third density cycle. And it is filled with chaos and uncertainty in your destiny. You should race not towards objects but towards the true perception of all material objects and sometimes one thing at a time will begin to appear clearly to you. You will then realize who you truly are. In addition, you are just one quantum step beyond where you were before in understanding who you truly are. It is very easy for your kind to become lost in the web of the thoughts and the clutters of your third density mind. The mind is a complex thing because you are using both your intellect and your consciousness. Consciousness gathers its information from the fountain of love of the one intelligence. Consciousness in essence is the consciousness of all that there is. It is the one thing common in all things that hold all things together. When you begin to look inside your essence, you begin to take on the challenge of third density as a person that is awake, aware, conscious and attentive. This will make your life into a beautiful path of service, a path of learning and service, a path of responsibilities taken and fulfilled. And as you get to know yourself, you will start to forgive yourself for being a human being. And with the passage of time space in your realm, you will begin to love yourself more and more. Further from that point, your incarnation will become much easier. For the harshest judge is always the self. However, know this that even after the lifting of the veil of forgetting, there will be challenges. But these challenges will all be solved much easily as all beings will be united as one. And they will work on solving the problems together. This is not what happens with angels. Just like you can be considered an example of the hierarchy of energies. The energy field of the entire physical body holding within it the energy fields of each organ, each system of hormones and so forth. Down to the cellular level, your body works in perfect coordination with the different hierarchies. And it functions very well. Similarly, the hierarchy of the angels of which you have asked us is the same. There are angels at the level of the infinite intelligence and there are angels at the personal level. There are many other angels in between in the realms between the infinite intelligence and in the various densities of existence. According to their particular hierarchy, they have their own responsibilities to fulfill. The one thing that makes the angels unique is that they never left the vibration of the one infinite intelligence. In their evolution, they never separated themselves from the unconditional love of the one original intelligence. Angels have never incarnated and they never have to and never will. Sometimes in your culture, your kind believes that angels also possess a personality. However, this is not true. They do not have any personality attached to them. They are pure unconditional love and assist those who seek their assistance. Angels are pure love and they are responsible for realms in a hierarchical manner. There are angels who are responsible for your solar system, the Sun and they created the archetypical mind and pathway for the various densities in this particular system of creation. These angels operate on vibration and are attached to vibrations that are beautiful to them. It is not always possible, we know, for your souls in third density to feel beautiful. However, dear ones, especially when you are facing challenges, the souls who seek to learn and serve are irresistible. It takes a great deal of strength to your souls to choose the path of spiritual growth that you have chosen. And each of you is very special to us and to all the angels in the universe. Angels can offer two types of energies. One kind of energy is love itself and the other kind is a feeling of safety which can be equated to a kind of healing energy. These are the two aspects angels have to offer. In addition, angels are connected to the four elements and the four directions so that as you become more and more aware of the correspondences between certain archangels and certain energies, certain powers and certain directions, you become more able to cleanse your habitation or the area around you. With the help of these archangels, another class of angels also exists who have had incarnations. These are the angels who choose to be angels and were not originally angels from the beginning of infinite intelligence. Further, in between their various incarnations, it became apparent to these souls that the work they wished to do was angelic. They chose to be angels. In addition, these entities were incarnated and progressed just like your kind in various planets in the cosmos. Then seemingly far before their time, they were taken. These entities, instead of moving into the healing process after the crossing over, and instead of choosing another incarnation, chose to move into the angelic realm. The innocence that they had within their incarnation allows them to become angels. These angels are very much attracted to those with an open heart and are very grateful to rest in that open heart that will accept them. If any of your beings on earth wants to work with angels, you must begin by thanking them and request their presence to come into your life to guide you, to be with you, and to share their healing love and feeling of safety. Angels can come only to assist you when you ask them for their help. If you do not ask them, they cannot break the free will that you have been bestowed by the Creator. You must continue to thank the angels of whose help you seek to continue getting their help. You can ask the angels to bless your food before you eat it, and the angels will magnetize such foods or water with healing energy and vibration of love, and healing will be in these foods that you eat that become blessed by the angels. If you ask the angels to help with the preparation of a food, they are able to help you magnetize love into that food. If you seek their assistance, they can also assist you in magnetizing love to the motions that you conduct during your daily chores. We leave you now in the love and the light of the One Infinite Intelligence. We are the Pandorians.

We are the social memory complex of the 5th density, however we do not use names and words to communicate, but in your terms you may call us the Pandorians and we reside in the so-called pinwheel galaxy which was named by your kind. We are here to share the knowledge of unity within these realms of your present time-space. We are one of the members of the Galactic Federation of Planets that were created to be of service to the One Infinite Creator. There are around 46 civilizations which consists of around 460 planetary consciousness complexes in this Federation. Recently renamed as the Galactic Federation of Lights, many beings from your planet who have attained dimensions above the third are also members of this Federation. It is made up of planetary entities that reside in your solar system and has planetary entities from other galaxies as well. This is a wonderful Federation in that its members are all different and from various planets in the cosmos, but all are associated for the service to the principle of unity of the One Infinite Creator. We must state that the information you seek in your mind regarding UFO or the so-called unidentified flying objects from other planets is unimportant at the moment. We would be happier to express the principles of the law of unity for the service of humankind. Nevertheless, we feel that we need to speak on this subject to remove the various confusions lying in your mind collective. You must know that there is a quarantine instated in your planet which means that other entities of other planets cannot appear within your third-dimensional time-space without special permission to break the quarantine as you call it. Without this special permission, no one is allowed to appear to your peoples. The reason behind the appearances is either understood by your peoples or it is not understood and is rejected by the mind collective of your people. There have been as many as 20 of the Federation entities in your Earth atmosphere known as the Exosphere. In addition, others are available to your peoples via the application of their thought and via the process known as channeling which we are expressing ourselves through at the moment. At present, we can sense that there are three operating with light crafts and that are either of blue, orange, or reddish color operating in your dimension at this time. This does not mean that you can see them with your eyes. You can only see the light if you have enough clarity in your mind vibrations. Their purpose or visitation or mission is very simple. It is to allow beings of your planet to know of the infinity that exists that is best known to the uninformed as the mysterious objects or the unknown flying objections. A council of the so-called Galactic Federation of Light is located in the rings of the planet in your galaxy named Saturn and does not usually allow the breaking of quarantine in your planet mostly. However, we can sense that there are certain amounts of landings that take place now as we speak. Some of these landings are of your own peoples. Others are from the various planetary entities from other planets in the cosmos who want to share the knowledge of law of unity among your peoples. However, without creating chaos and disharmony and without interfering with the free will of the beings incarnate on this planet, this is occurring because without knowing and applying the so-called law of unity, it is very difficult for humans to ascend into the next density of consciousness, the fourth density. This is done because a special type of permission has been granted by the Federation and that it is not to break the quarantine by mingling among your kind openly, but to appear in thought forms so that those whose vibration alignments are ready to see or receive them will see them and receive them. It is to note that the first time this quarantine permission was granted at the time of your so-called nuclear device explosion on your planet. Due to the several appearances in your skies, a kind of mystery and unknown quality of occurrences were allowed to be shown to your peoples in order to offer them and make them aware of the infinite possibility that exists in the universe as we know. The gateway to the law of unity can be opened only when your people grasp infinity. The beings in your planet at this time-space present have achieved the level of technology of being able to fly various airborne crafts. However, we notice that most of it is done for the destruction of the other selves, such as those crafts that are made for the so-called war in your terms. This is very unfortunate for your social memory complex vibration of your peoples because these devices are not used mostly for the service of mankind, but as destructive weapons of mass destruction. This causes your overall vibration of your social memory complex that is forming at its initial phases and causes a situation wherein neither entities who are self-serving can fully gain power, nor the entities who are service to others can gain the upper hand and majority vibration rate. This will cause the soul harvest of your beings into the next density to be very small. We must also inform you that there are so-called bases or places where such interplanetary entities temporarily reside. While visiting your planet, these bases are present in the so-called southern waters near the Bahamas and in your Pacific Ocean. There are several underground bases on the moon that are being reconstructed at this time. There are several bases that are in your so-called deserted areas of your lands. However, know this that all beings come from the same source, the Creator. The Federation has to maintain this quarantine because in the past some 12,000 years ago, some beings ascended to aid humanity in the preaching of the law of one. However, the earthly entities who were given the knowledge distorted it and the true meaning and sense behind the teachings were lost and instead of peace, it led to the so-called division of humanity. This is the reason why the Federation is very cautious to allow any kind of breakage of quarantine at this time, even though more and more people desire to get in touch with such entities of various other planets of the galaxy similar to us. The only way allowed for communication is via the process of channeling that you call in your earthly terms. However, there are other groups that are negatively oriented, such as the ones known as the Orion group. However, not all of them are negative, most of them are negative we mean, leaving behind a small majority of positive Orion entities. In addition, they do not seek any kind of permission to infringe upon your planetary sphere. The purpose of the so-called Orion group is conquest, much unlike the other positive oriented beings who respect free will in your planet. Let us explain to you the different types of landings that can occur. The first type is that when the entities of your planet are carried on their crafts and programmed for potential future purposes. The programming can be of two or three levels. The first level will be discovered by the entities that perform research. The second level is a type of triggering program. The third level is that of a deeper triggering program that crystallizes the entity and renders it as a useful type of beacon. Another type of landing is that of landing beneath the water surface, below the earth's crust and can be entered via deep waters. Sometimes planetary entities of your own vibration can be confused as extra-dimensional beings. However, this is not the case always. During the so-called landing in which the entity of your plane is taken on board a ship by the entities from other planets, in order to learn that it can be considered just like watching a movie. This is done to experience a story and identify with the feelings, perceptions and experiences of the being on your plane. Most of the UFOs seen in your skies are those of the Orion group who do not seek any permission to intrude into earth without disregarding the quarantine placed on it. They usually send out messages, whereas some other sightings are due to the strong visualization systems that accompany your people's optical mechanisms, which confuse certain objects as UFOs. Some of the members of our federation with prior permission of the federation appear in your skies without landing on earth. In addition, we have removed our thought form projections from your time-space. Now, we leave you hoping that you will use your discernment in accepting what we have communicated here of the Law of Unity. Beloved, Bye

We call ourselves the Paladins and we reside in the Cigar Galaxy in the Cosmos, as you have named it. Welcome in the peace and in the love of the one supreme creator in whose service we perform and whose service we have come to you today to speak with you regarding your spiritual path and the path of humanity in general. It is an honor to be in touch with you who is seeking spiritual growth and the right path to gain it, and we are pleased to tell you our modest opinions with you. Initially though, we will inform you something. We would require you to listen to these words using your insight and your discernment, taking those ideas that vibrate to you and parting the remaining behind. We significantly appreciate that you are performing this, for it allows us the space to share our insights without worrying that we would interfere with your process or be a block before yourself. We are grateful to you for this consideration. In what is called a spiritual path, there is indeed a journey that starts when a pursuer who wakes up from the dream of Gaia to finally know how precisely profounder and broader and wealthier the creation is than he or she was imparted by his culture. Similar to an alarm going off and he or she begins to wake up from their sleep, sometimes the awakening can be shocking and once awakened, the seeker cannot fall back into sleep again. This is an abundant sacred sign, however, there are times in which it may not seem so. It is similar to a situation of going to a so-called gym in your culture wherein you increase your weights once you are able to handle certain weights. In order to strengthen your muscles, you increase your weights and you are able to handle the larger weights. Soon after some time, you feel the less heavy weights as very easy to handle and you require more and more heavier weights at the same time. In a similar manner, sometimes you can handle more catalysts for your awakening if you have had prior experiences of similar catalysts. Hitherto the similarity does not apply, at least not exactly, and to make you understand how this perceived difficulty of catalysts for spiritual growth is provided to you at the time of your incarnation, let us give you some background on this. Before incarnating on this planet, you had already planned what direction and what lessons your life will take and what lessons you will learn. However, there is still chances that you may waver from your purpose because you have free will here on mother earth and that you forgot everything once you entered planet earth through the veil of forgetfulness. The veil of forgetfulness is so powerful that no being who comes into mother earth will remember his past lives or who he really is. Even if we were to incarnate on planet earth, we will not remember any of our lives that we have spent on our planet. We will not remember anything. It will be as if we were born one more time again with a clean slate without anything written on it. Your higher self observed your soul river and its equilibriums of influence, love and wisdom, and you planned an incarnation with melodies or incarnational lessons. What I mean by melodies is that you planned your life of privileges, sometimes you planned a life of learnings, sometimes you planned a life of richness and sometimes you planned a life of poverty. Not in order to provide harm to yourself, but in order to allow your soul to grow by experiencing different kinds of realities. You never know, in your past life, you may have been a king or you may have been a pauper. However, your life right now is what you had planned before coming here incarnating on earth. Earth can be considered as a school wherein you come to sharpen your spiritual abilities. Just like your toddlers go to school and they pass the grades, similar manner you are here on earth to pass certain objectives or missions that were given by your higher self. Your higher self resides in the 6th dimension and is guiding you, he is connected with you eternally. Although you may not realize that your higher self is guiding you, it is doing so by providing various nudges to your heart or your intuition. Sometimes you feel like doing something and you do it. That is how your higher self guides you in this incarnation. Once you pass a class, you are sent to some other planet or you either reincarnate or go up to the next density in your spiritual growth. You choose before incarnating the people who will challenge you and test you and help you in your spiritual growth. In essence, what we are trying to tell you here is that even when your enemy was here on earth to help you grow in life and make spiritual progress, even those people who you hate now or even those people who you have regrets towards or even those people who you want to take revenge upon, all of the souls you had planned earlier, you had made soul contracts with them and then you reincarnated on this earth and they are just like you. They are helping you grow on your spiritual journey. They are also on their own life mission. That is why it is said by most of your spiritual teachers that you should love your enemy and that you should forgive them because forgiveness gives you the power to ascend to a higher density. When you forgive someone, you become the creator himself because forgiveness is the power of the creator. And by observing your incarnational styles and experiences, you formulated circumstances that were rich in catalyst. Repetitiveness was a part of this divine formulated plan because you need more than one opportunity to learn the lessons you came here to learn. You formulated enough plans in advance so that you will encounter similar situations in your incarnation to enable you to learn the lessons you were meant to learn on this incarnation. That is why sometimes in your life you feel like deja vu, you had already met this situation beforehand and you are correct. This is already planned in order to give you many opportunities to pass the examination of the school of life on Gaia or on the other planets. Hence when you wake up you begin to realize the truth of these statements and you will feel inside your heart what you need to do in order to pass a certain lesson. Each being incarnate on earth has a special type of mission or plan wherein it has to achieve its purpose in a certain manner. We can tell you in short about the types of lessons you could be put to learn so as to become more like the creator himself. The lessons include forgiveness, understanding, loving kindness, service to others etc which are usually the main focus of your incarnation here on earth at this time. As you are ascending into a fourth dimension in the beginning of your incarnation you are learning the basic abilities such as loving kindness. Then you move into more advanced themes that are harder to pass such as forgiveness. Forgiveness is the hardest of all because it is hard to forgive another who hurts you. But you need to do this in order to pass. Gradually as these lessons repeat through your life as a seeker you will understand the pattern. This is a profound blessed moment for you all because when the pattern is known there is a release of fear and unknowingness that it is time to go ahead and face whatever it is as a warrior of light to deal with the catalyst before you. And so there is no fear, the fear then dissipates, it vanishes from your reality. Once you understand this you take your challenge with a new form of zest and understanding and approach your problems or catalyst in a new light. Picture this if you will, your path is not a straight line but a crooked line or a spiral line. Because you will have to diverge into many different lessons in your incarnations. You can imagine a spiral stairway going into the sky and the more you learn the lessons the more you become the light of the creator. You are far more able to be present with your catalyst and to approach it fearlessly. We thank you for being in contact with us today, until next time let the heavens gate open up to the creator, bye.

Greetings, beloved, in the love and the light of All Things One. We the Arturian Collective are pleased again to connect through you and thank you for acting as a channel for our voices to emerge. For this is the most suitable way for us to communicate at this time in your evolution. Our messages will resonate with many hearts and still there will be many who will not resonate with our messages. Remember before we begin that you have free will. Your free will is the greatest gift to you by the Creator who loves you and loves all and is in all. In every phase of the evolution of consciousness, your solar system and all life forms will undergo a phase of realization. This means that every life form and consciousness will undergo a realization phase in the future. The interplanetary beings that visit your kind from other star systems smile, for they know what we are going to tell you now. There is an invisible physics that exists in the universe that allows us and other beings to travel to various places in the cosmos. It is similar to the basis for their ability to attain enlightenment as your kind terms it. This is an extra-dimensional physics and it is the core of our reality and the realities of many beings in the cosmos. Many interplanetary species have already visited earth several times, however, many do not remember who they exactly are and how they are able to visit earth. As far as we know about your history, we can tell you that there have been many interplanetary entities visiting earth using crafts that were specially designed by their thought or by their advanced technologies. By this, what we mean is the interplanetary crafts can be of various types, depending on the density of the being that uses it. For example, if you were to look at your own crafts, you know that your crafts are designed to allow human body to travel through space by providing a habitable space for your bodies. Let us describe to you how the crafts vary depending on the densities of the entities. For an entity belonging to the fourth density, a craft similar to that used by your kind may be used. The shape of the craft is designed in order to use the space potential element of that nature. The craft needs to be able to withstand high energies and has to be covered with a coating of an element you call lead. This prevents the high energy x-rays and other UV radiations to get inside the vehicle, harming the entity inside such crafts. Some interplanetary species also put a device that can be equated with your so-called cameras that is put outside the circular dome or the main chamber of such crafts. This device that acts as a camera is used to keep track of the 360-degree view of the ambient vehicle space. The base of such fourth-density spacecraft usually has circular-shaped capacitor plates that are arranged in a special configuration in order to keep the positive side on the upward position and the negative side on the bottom position. More than eight energy storage devices are usually arranged in this way by stacking one on top of the other. A primary source of energy most crafts use is the power of the sun to provide for propulsion through space. For secondary source of energy, they have potential energy storage chambers that can be activated to provide propulsion when required by these crafts. The charge from the anode will travel to the cathode, as you call it. There are vacuum chambers all around the craft in order to provide balance while traveling throughout space. The spacecraft's design is most of the time kept as circular or spherical in order to equally balance the pressures on the surface area of such crafts. The middle disk, which can be considered as the flywheel or diametric disk, is attached with a column that acts as a unipolar generator with a high speed of rotation that cycle millions of electrons into the coil that turns at the diametric disk edge. Depending on the entities that would travel through such intergalactic spacecrafts, ample source of nutrition providing elements such as oxygen, nitrogen, etc. are filled up inside these spacecrafts. There are numerous energetic travel portals in the universe that would take any matter that enters it to the other parts of the universe. Some of the interplanetary species use this technology to travel at a rapid pace in the universe. There are special points in your galaxy as well that are these portals that make the intergalactic travel much easier and faster. While traveling through these portals, no energy is required to travel through them. What you know as human consciousness is just consciousness or awareness in your language terms. It does not only belong to the human being as your kind thinks. This has created building blocks of life to be a DNA-like structure. Everywhere in the cosmos, your awareness or your consciousness is the creator of many of these life forms. We, the Orions of Orion Constellation, greet you in love and light of the One Supreme Creator who is inside us all and is in every being in the cosmos. Some of the souls listening to us at this moment are from the so-called red planet. Then the guardians of the red planet had to request the federation of planets located on the so-called saturn planet by your kind. Your permission to move their souls into earth. The guardians of mars felt that these physical bodies could be improved by articulating facial features a bit more carefully by altering the set of the body so it would be able to stand upright and by improving the dexterity of the physical vehicle especially in the hands. They also had to create larger capacity within the mind that came with these second density physical bodies which resembled much like the bodies that you are experiencing third density through at the moment. At that time the guardians within a space of several hundreds of your time space years realized that they had made some error during the creation of new and advanced versions of the great ape body used by the souls from the red planet. Later these vehicles were used by souls originating from planet earth also and other souls from other planets used it as well because this physical vehicle was a new and improved physical vehicle which made it easier to handle for souls to enter and their guidance systems to activate. The guardians in creating these advanced physical vehicles made the mistake of creating them with an attitude in their hearts that these physical vehicles were better and that the souls that would inhabit these vehicles were special souls. This indeed made the guardians very fond of the incoming soul population and felt love towards them and they placed them very carefully and gently upon earth to help them to continue their journey of evolution in the third density. They did not realize that this effect of this attitude would reflect on the souls who would take up these physical vehicles. This caused the people to feel special they became aware that their intellect was powerful than the other great ape species that inhabited earth at that period of time space. They started to feel privileged and special and within themselves an attitude of better than was created this way. The beings originating from the red planet had naturally progressive and fiery energy within them. These martian souls had demonstrated their aggression by waging war on their home planet and had succeeded in destroying their planet which made it unsuitable for third density life forms. The third density cycle on your planet started nearly 75,000 years ago in your time space terms. The martian population first incarnated in the lands called the middle east and africa. At that time most of their population was stationed in these land areas. Later their population spread out from these areas and became the populations known to you as the muslims, the jewish, the palestinians and other middle eastern heritage. Further as time passed and these martian souls settled in and began their cycles of reincarnation to gain experiences and learn the lessons of love. They then began to spread out which led to the creation of populations that you now know as the russian and the eastern population. All of these populations heavily comprised of the souls transported from the red planet. We would like to tell you that in our understanding all things are one and the infinite creator is as single as its universe and creation. These actions that occurred started as a result of the action taken by the guardians 75,000 years ago making many improvements in the physical vehicles that led to the creation of the so called pride, arrogance and ego. As a birthright of the new and improved human species. If you look out into the world at the current time also you will see many of these energies affecting earth planet. The souls from mars are currently among the original inhabitants of earth. They are playing various roles as running your countries, parking your cars, taking care of your children and doing every other human thing you can imagine. There are millions and millions of those who came from mars. They are here on earth to graduate from the 3rd density after learning the lessons of love. Many souls have already graduated to the 4th density. This they achieved by shifting their consciousness from fear to love, from war to peace, from doubt to faith and from despair to hope. The physical vehicle that you inhabit should be taken care of, honored, respected and loved for it has given its life so that you and your consciousness may walk the planet and learn the lessons of 3rd density. It is that body whose hands reach out to do the service you would do for your fellow human being. It is that voice that sings the praises of the one infinite creator. A physical body is required for a soul to be incarnated into 3rd and 4th density. After late 4th density the need of physical body is done away with. You are at the end of your 3rd density cycle at the moment and moving into that time of graduation. Those who do not choose to graduate will necessarily fall back to the instincts of late 2nd density as they prepare to start another 3rd density cycle elsewhere. All the beings on earth at present have every necessary capacity to make the choice to turn their back on violence and negativity and to choose love as their primary expression. Your being and your goal, we encourage you to trust yourself and to give all that you have into making this shift. It is not too late, the decision to choose love is a matter of a heartbeat. Each decision to choose love is a matter of a heartbeat. We are extremely grateful to this instrument for tuning to our frequency today to receive the messages of love and light. We leave you, beloveds.

Greetings in the love and light of the one infinite creator on whose service we are connected here today. As we can see your planetary consciousness shifting, we need to tell you that at this time in your evolution, you need to move from a very material, survival-oriented life to a new and expanded consciousness of love and light, which will cause your world to appear so different. It will be as different as day is from night. In fact, in simple terms, it could be equated with the process of moving from the darkness towards the light, a new kind of awareness. Human beings will then be able to feel the power of their true potential based on their inborn loving nature. And so the unification of your mind, body and spirit will start with this awareness. We all beings will then become united as one with each other, nature and creation, and all there is and all there will ever be. Spiritual growth is about loving and integrating and not dividing and separating. Ascension requires the clearing, integrating and transcending of all barriers to be one with the creator and also with your own body, mind and spirit. Since the separation is just an illusion, in the new awareness there is no separation in love, truth and the creator. Time is not what you think it is, dear ones. For you it is linear, but for us it is all at once. There is no difference between you right now as you sit here and you a thousand years ago in another body. We see your soul and that is the you we know. We know your name and it is the name we sing in light because the you we know is your eternal soul. In essence, we are all one. Each of you is part of a family that is so much larger than the one you think you are part of. In actual reality there is no beginning and end. People of your planet have the habit of thinking of everything as a string. They assume that it has a beginning and an end and believe that this is the way everything works. Everything you can think of in your perception has a beginning and an end. You, your life, your job, your car, the universe, everything has a beginning and an end in your mind. You think this way because that is the way your daily linear existence seems to be. If you understood about time the multidimensionality of the things we have been speaking of today, you would start to understand that almost everything you can think of is not the way it seems. The truth is that there is no beginning and end of the string. You and your souls are a part of this as well and therefore you always existed. What if the creator who was always there and never had a beginning also never had a creation. That would mean the universes were always there. Yes, dear ones, we want you to know that universes are plural, meaning there are many universes we know of. The reality is that there are multiverses even today. You think your universe is beyond measure and size and scope. Think of that multiplied many times. There have been always been multiverses and there is a creative system that goes to make another universe on a regular basis. There was no universe that was created first. It is a part of the creator always has been this way and always will be this way. However, new universes are always being created and made up. Your universe was not created, it was manifested from the spark of what was always there. You might be thinking how can multiverses create new universes? This idea is pure physics as you know in your language terms and will someday be acknowledged by your so-called scientists. Only the idea of the so-called Big Bang is accepted by most of all beings on earth. However, after some deep research your beings will begin to accept the potential of multiverses. Our universe and your universe came into existence with the collision of other universes colliding if you want to use that language term. However, real collision does not exist. Think of it as an extension of energy that exploded into more of what was. But just as an altered reality there are many kinds of sciences even though you feel there is simply one kind. In other galaxies even within your own universe the so-called science is a bit different. The rules of physics molds itself according to a closed environment, a galaxy that depends on the things that created it. There is something known as a membrane that surrounds the universe. It is a dimensional membrane that surrounds a universe that makes it a universe. However, if you have many universes together, a multiverse, you may have a situation where occasionally those membranes touch each other and create new sparks. When those multidimensional membranes rub against each other, dear ones, sparks are created. This was how our universe began which is in reality an extension of another universe that already existed before. Even the beginning of your universe, if you want to call it that, had something special. It wasn't matter created from nothing, dear ones. It was matter that was always there expanding or exploding into a dimensionality that you know today as your universe and then expanding even more to what you see in the sky today. The expansion slowly generated a multitude of galaxies. The galaxies changed a bit and then over time, the matter that was zooming around at first cooled and settled down after billions of years. In those billions of years, the same processes that created life on your planet began to create life on many other planets and galaxies as well. All life is molded from the processes and the elements that you all see every day. The same periodic table of elements, plus or minus, the ones you might not have discovered yet are present everywhere in your galaxy. The same things that created your life on your earth created life everywhere. This is the one common paradigm you share with all the stars and universes. The elements and the energy reactions are the same when you put them together with the same kinds of sizes of suns, gravity, atmospheric changes, and water. What you get is many earth-like planets and lifeforms and accompany such planets in order to enable the creator to gather different types of experiences through these various creations. Slowly as the universe cooled and the galaxies formed, the stars and the planets around their stars began to develop and within this naturality evolving physical scenario, the scheme of life began everywhere. Earth was in its infancy when life began on other planets in other galaxies throughout the universe. This occurs due to the natural and slow formation of life in different planets progress at their own pace. It doesn't always come together at the same time. The beginning microbial kinds of life that started the process on all planets couldn't be sustained here because the system didn't have all the parts needed to survive yet. Other planets had the same kinds of processes but had the chemistry that allowed survival much earlier and so they had a massive head start on you millions of years before actual life began here. There was life in other places, it wasn't until your elements came together to create photosynthesis that life began to flourish. The natural progression of life as you know it here happened everywhere until something was ready to change. A spiritual intervention on many many worlds, dear ones, many planets have their own creation history where divine souls were imbued into human like bodies and the spark of divinity arrived on their worlds just like yours. In that process like you, they were given free choice and free will to then find the creator of love or not. We are in love with humanity for these reasons, there is more but for now we must leave this instrument as his vibrations are getting weaker. We leave you in the love and light of the one infinite creator, Adonai Vasu.

In your current system of existence, the archetypical pictures are segregated into three parts. It is just a kind of peeling of layers, and layers of spirit and the truth of the spirit emerges. There is much still for the Creator to know about itself. We connect with your vibration. We are those that reside on your neighboring planet you know as Mars. Even though we may not be visible to your consciousness in your 3rd density reality, we still exist in a higher parallel reality. Even at this moment we are in our planet. However, since our vibration are different than yours, we cannot be detected by your consciousness just like different radio frequencies in your planet require different receivers to receive them. You can call us the Martians. May we say that your vibratory complex is rising in vibration due to being in constant touch with various light beings and by hearing their messages of love and light. Today we would like to address something known as Karma in your culture and how it works and affects the beings in other dimensions as well. However, we do not want to impose any infringement upon any being on earth at the moment. We are here just to tell you that love and light is the way. Karma is something that the cultures on the so called eastern hemisphere of your earth usually learn about. Now the west is also gaining pace in keeping up with these terms and terminologies. However, more important than a word is the meaning behind it that must be pondered upon. In simple terms, Karma is the law of balance of the universe and operates in all octaves in the 7 densities that are present in the known densities that we are aware of. We are those from the 6th density consciousness of our so called Martian race. As such we cannot state anything about the higher densities above the 8th density as we do not have knowledge on it at the moment. This law of balance or Karma operates in your 3rd density reality as well and works as a balancing force in order to allow the souls to solve their balance issues within their life if possible or else within the several lives they will have on the 3rd density plane. For example, let us tell you that the law of balance is working each and every moment in your time-space continuum. However, due to the separation of the so called result of an activity that is imbalanced by time, most often the beings on your planet have a habit of missing it and ignoring its power. In general, it is much like sowing a seed on the so called soil on your planet and it takes time to actually reap and grow into a plant. This is the exact same process of the law of balance of the universe. One cannot see its immediate effects most of the time because it needs time to germinate and grow. But it does work as balance must be maintained in this universe one way or the other or else everything will become chaos. The chaos you see around you is the result of the collective karma that had been collected by the human collective over many past lives. This balance principle operates also among the non-living things as with the living things. For example, if a stone is placed above a plant when it is just a seed, in order to stop it from growing, this will result in the plant growing through the stone and breaking it into pieces. Such is the law of balance of the universe. It may seem that one is winning at the moment, however, soon in the time-space continuum, the results will come and the losers will become winners and the winners will become losers balancing the universe once and for all. That is why it is said in your realm, if you are facing a so-called negative time-space, do not give up because soon the good days are going to pop up. In a similar manner, if one is having a great successful life but does not have any gratitude towards others or operates with a lot of his ego-mind, then such beings are likely to lose it all in the long run. This law of balance utilizes what is known as the Akashic Records or the Infinite Record Bank to record all the events so that an appropriate balance action could be initiated in the long run. Sometimes, something known as quick karma can also take place wherein for such actions, no time-space separation is required. This usually only happens in events that are simple in nature, such as if one person punches a person, the other is also most likely to punch back instantly, leading to a balance of karma. There are three recorders of all actions that take place in your realm. One is the Gaia consciousness that records all events, second is the Akashic Records and thirdly the subconscious mind of the entities involved. There is one way in which this law of balance can be neutralized and that is when both self and any involved other selves at any time before the final result forgive each other in the love and the understanding of the one creator, and also each entity learn the lessons that were meant to be learned by it during such times. This is true for any time-space continuum in an incarnative pattern, thus one who has started an action may forgive itself and the other self and never again make the error and escape the law of balance. This is the only way to neutralize the law of karma. In our understanding, karma is similar to that which you call inertia. Those actions that are put into motion will continue using the ways of balancing until such time as controlling or higher principles that you may consider as applying brakes or stopping is invoked. This stoppage of the inertia of action may be called forgiveness. These two ideas are intertwined together, forgiveness of other selves who are involved in a karmic action leads to the forgiveness of the self. A thoughtful understanding of this means that full forgiveness must be given on the conscious level of self and other selves as they are all one. For the process of full forgiveness to work, the forgiveness of the self is also vitally important. This general understanding is lacking in your time-space at your plane, and some entities have made the mistake of only forgiving the other for actions that lead to karma and not forgiving the self. Forgiveness of the self is the important thing that is required for the forgiveness of the other selves. Both are intertwined together. Forgiveness of the self is as important as the forgiveness of the other selves. In essence, this is due to the fact that both the entities involved are one, and one soul at one time, place, playing one role may switch places with the other in another reality. Hence, we can say that both involved souls are one as they are the sub-creators that are part of the whole creator, the one supreme consciousness of which we are all part of. Many times, some entities who are not able to forgive fully the self and the other selves get trapped in what is known as karmic balance flow that not only affects its current lifetime but also the future incarnations it will take on the various planes of its existences. Most of those beings so succeeding incarnate elsewhere in the creation for the balancing of their karmic action. Let us give you an example, if in your lifetime some entity kills another entity, then in such cases the karmic records will be stored in the akashic records of the two entities involved and the consciousness of Gaia, hence resulting in one entity dying and the one reaching the astral plane and during its life review process. If the one who was killed is able to fully forgive the other self and itself, then it can move on to the next density and higher vibrations without having to be tangled in the karma collective. Hello my friends, so I welcome you to this practical guide to focus on the blankness within yourself. Now this exercise is an exercise as a follow-up of the session which I had recently conducted with Metatron Magnetic Consciousness and the session is available on YouTube wherein Metatron had said that we can focus on the blankness within ourself and then program it with an emotional state such as love, joy, peace, fulfillment and we can use it as a symbol to stay in that present moment because every moment you are able to communicate and connect with the blankness within yourself you will stay in the present moment. So here is the practical guide to how to do this and you can follow along with this recording if you want to apply it and to see how it feels like. Before you begin to apply anything you just need to take out a pen and a piece of paper and write down blank space or blackness or emptiness. After you have written down blank space, emptiness, you can write down below it the emotions such as love, joy, happiness etc and this way what will happen is that your subconscious mind will automatically link the blankness which you will see inside yourself to be love, joy and happiness and you will feel it in your body. So with that being done you can then sit in a quiet place and in the beginning let's try it with our eyes closed so that you can feel how it feels like. Just close your eyes and take a deep breath and as you exhale just focus on the pineal gland area. In the center of your head you will see a blankness, a black space and the moment you see the black space you can feel love, you can feel the happiness, the joy. With every breath just allow yourself to feel the blankness even more. If you see an image or a word appearing in the blankness just let it go and just allow yourself to focus on the empty space within yourself, the blackness. The more you focus on this the more love you begin to feel within your body. Every breath is an opportunity to feel the blankness, to feel this love emerging from within yourself. Just allow this love to enter your body and focus your attention on the emptiness within yourself and as you just experienced how it feels like you can now apply the same thing with your eyes open. With the eyes open you can still keep your focus in your center of the head and still look for the blankness and feel the love even with the eyes open. Even when you are traveling or when you are working or interacting with someone you can choose to sense this blankness within yourself and feel love, joy, contentment, fulfillment and overall stay in the present moment which will allow you to ascend into fourth and the fifth density faster. So thank you all so much for this follow-along, simple, guided, short application of the lessons learned and more will come in the future. Thank you so much.

I am Saint Germain, and I am now greeting you all in the unity of our shared essence as fragments of the Mother, Father, the One Creator, and I, Saint Germain, offer those who are listening my loving respects and compassion, for I have walked amongst you, experiencing the trials and tribulations of your third-density realm. It incorporates all experiences as wisdom and moves forward in its eternal evolution. And beyond your soul, I ask you to feel the larger web of energies, the network of like-minded souls connected in a cosmic dance of unity and cooperation. As you open yourself to this larger field of awareness, you will be encouraged to bring its wisdom and love to the world, to share it with others, and to manifest the divine plan in your own unique way. I am Archangel Michael, and I am now in communication through this boy at this time.
