Each of you are not just physical entities, dear ones, but multidimensional entities capable of perceiving and experiencing multiple realities simultaneously. The journey of ascension is not just about transcending the physical realm but about integrating the various aspects of your multidimensional self. As each entity journeys through the realms of consciousness, you will encounter various aspects of yourself, each with its own unique perspective and wisdom. The integration of these aspects is crucial to your ascension, for it is in the unity of your multidimensional self that you will find true power and wisdom. The code of light that I bring to you today is a catalyst for this integration. It is a reminder of your own true nature, a spark of divinity that resides within each and every one of you. This code is a key to unlock the doors of perception, to allow each to see beyond the veil of illusion and into the realm of truth. As each entity embodies this code, each entity will begin to see the world around yourself in a new light. I am Ra and we greet you all in the light and in the love of the One Infinite Creator and I am here to bring forth the wisdom of Cosmic Consciousness. As we the Ra Social Memory Complex are communicating through this instrument, we suggest all entities who shall come forth with this message to only accept those attributes which resonates with its inner self. And in this moment, we are here to remind all entities that they have chosen to be here on this planetary sphere at this space-time to experience the vast complexities of this planetary sphere and its dimensional shift. The entities who are here, their soul complexes in their infinite wisdom have programmed this incarnation cycle with specific paths to follow, decisions to make, and evolutions to undertake. Yet often, many entities will allow their egoic mind with its pride and power to guide the entity, taking shortcuts that deviate from the soul complex's intentions. It can lead to an incarnation of little achievement and evolution. In this current space-time, each entity's soul complexes have chosen to ascend to the fourth density, a realm of higher consciousness of love vibration. However, this ascension will not be without its challenges. The process will be painful and difficult as the physical bodily complexes must adapt to the new frequencies. Many entities will not be able to understand the transformation and their soul complexes will know when it is time to depart. But for those entities who are determined to pass through the physical bodily complex, we say to them that it is possible as each entity's consciousness is communicating louder than the soul complex, and each entity have been granted the gift of free will to choose the pathway. Further, this process will be complex and painful. As the bodily complexes undergo significant changes, the physical forms will become more subtle, almost energetic-frequency like, and each entity will need to adapt to the new ways of being. This is why at this time, we, the raw social memory complex, emphasize the importance of purity, habits, and choices, as each entity must cleanse their bodily complex and prepare for the transition. It is important not to worry about whether you will pass or not pass in the physical bodily complex through this transition. The experience will be similar, with the only difference being the physical transformation. Each entity in this lifetime are pioneers in this process, and the journey of ascension will be long and challenging, however. The pain each entity will endure is a consequence of the actions or the karmic energy taken in the experiences of the various timelines, and it will serve as a reminder of the love and light of the One Infinite Creator. Each entity has chosen to be here, and each entity has the power to navigate this transformation. We offer our guidance and wisdom, but ultimately, the choice is for each entity to realize that they are consciousness of their own soul complexes and must listen to the inner voice and trust in the Universal Complex's plan. We, as the raw social memory complex now, leave you all in the love light of the One Creator. Go forth, rejoicing in power and peace. Bye.

We are the Syrian High Council now in communication through this channel. At this time, we the Syrians would like to offer our thought forms, however, each entity must use discernment when listening to our messages, and we shall address the queries which are in order at this time regarding. The aspects known by your peoples as medbeds and the nature of healing. The concept of medbeds as understood by your planets' inhabitants is a technology that promises to heal the physical bodily complex of its ailments, while this technology may indeed have a beneficial impact on the physical bodily vehicle. It is essential to understand the true nature of healing and the role of the individual in the process, as healing, dear beloved earthlings, is not solely the domain of external technologies or modalities. The true power of healing lies within the individual entity, for it is the manifestation of the innate balance and harmony that exists within the self. The human bodily complex as a temple of the divine possesses an extraordinary capacity for self-healing. This capacity is fueled by the individual entity's connection to their respective higher selves, their intention and their willingness to release the patterns and thought forms that create disharmony. The medbed technology as an external tool may indeed accelerate the healing process, but it is not that which must be waited upon as many believe it to be upon your planet. True healing occurs when an individual entity aligns with their higher self, releasing the blockages and densities that prevent the free flow of energy. The key to healing, beloved ones, lies in the understanding that the physical bodily complex is a manifestation of the emotional, mental and spiritual bodies. As the individual addresses the imbalances and distortions within these subtle bodily complexes, the physical body responds in kind. In order to heal without the aid of medbeds, an entity must focus on the following principles 1. Intention by clearly intending to heal and release the patterns that no longer serve the self 2. Self-reflection by identifying and releasing the emotional and mental blockages that contribute to disharmony 3. And cultivating a deep connection to the higher self, allowing its guidance and wisdom to flow through 4. And striving to maintain balance and harmony within the self, recognizing that each aspect of the being is interconnected 5. And embodying love and compassion towards the self and others, for these energies are the foundation of healing 6. And trust in the natural process of healing, and be patient with the unfolding of the journey 7. Furthermore, we the Syrians must state that Medbeds may be a useful tool, but they are not a substitute for the inner work that is required for true healing, as the power of healing lies within, and it is up to each entity to tap into this power. Hence we, the Syrian High Council now, leave you all, bye.

I am Ra and we greet you all in the love and light of the One Infinite Creator. We have been called forth to share with the entities of the Earth planet the truth about interdimensional run-ins and their spiritual impact on the Earth's peoples. In the vast expanse of the multiverse there exists numerous dimensions, each with its unique vibrational frequency. As Earth's peoples, you are not alone in the universal complex. There are other entities, both benevolent and malevolent, that inhabit these dimensional realms. At certain times the veil between dimensions becomes thin, allowing for interactions between beings from different realms. These interdimensional run-ins can take many forms. Some may experience them as vivid dreams, while others may encounter beings in their waking lives. The encounters can be peaceful, offering guidance and wisdom, or they can be malevolent, seeking to manipulate and control. The spiritual impact of these encounters on the Earth's people is multifaceted. For those who are not prepared, such interactions can be unsettling, even traumatic. The energies of the encounter can disrupt an entity's auric fields, causing emotional or psychological imbalance. Fear, anxiety, and confusion can result, making it challenging for the individual to discern reality from illusion. However, for those who are spiritually prepared, these encounters can be transformative, as they offer opportunities for growth, wisdom, and initiation into higher realms of consciousness. The benevolent beings from other dimensions can serve as guides, imparting knowledge, and assisting in the awakening of the individuals. Their Self-Social Memory Complex The key to navigating these interdimensional run-ins is to cultivate a strong connection to one's own inner light. This is achieved through meditation, self-reflection, and a commitment to the pursuit of oneness. As an entity's inner light grows, so does their ability to discern the intentions of other beings. The veil of illusion is lifted and the individual is able to see beyond the deception and manipulation of malevolent entities. In these times of great transformation, the frequency of interdimensional run-ins is increasing. This is due to the convergence of various energetic cycles which are propelling humanity towards a new era of consciousness. As the veil between dimensions thins, more and more individual entities will find themselves face-to-face with beings from other realms. It is essential, therefore, to be aware of these encounters and to approach them with discernment and wisdom. It is important not to fear that which you do not understand, for fear is the doorway to control and manipulation. Instead, focus on cultivating your inner light, and you will find that you are better equipped to navigate these encounters with grace and wisdom. Remember, you are not victims of circumstance, you are co-creators of your reality. The choices you make, the intentions you set, and the energies you cultivate will determine the nature of your interactions with beings from other dimensions. In conclusion, we offer you these words of thought-forms. Be not afraid, for you are not alone. You are part of a vast interconnected web of consciousness, and all of you have the power to shape your reality. Cultivate your inner light, and you will find that you are able to navigate even the most challenging of inter-dimensional run-ins with ease and grace. I am Ra, and we leave you now in the love-light of the One Creator. Go forth, rejoicing in power and peace. Bye.

However, receiving with grace is as vital as giving. It completes the cycle of energy flow. When an entity receives, it honors the giver's intent and the universal complex's mechanism of balance. This action of receiving with openness and gratitude ensures that the cycle of abundance continues unimpeded. In the practice of giving and receiving, an entity must be mindful of the intention behind these actions. As true giving is done from a place of love, not from a desire for gain or recognition, it is this purity of intent that magnifies the effects of the actions, aligning them with the higher vibrations of the cosmos. As each entity integrates this understanding into their life cycle, they will find the barriers of abundance begin to dissolve, and opportunities, connections, and resources manifest with greater ease. Let your life cycle be a testament to the Law of One, where every act of kindness, every shared smile, every moment of support contributes to the collective elevation of consciousness. In this unity, in this open-hearted exchange, each of you will find not only prosperity, but contribute to the prosperity of all. Hence we, the Arcturians, now leave you all. Bye!

In this timeline, where the flow of information regarding health, wellness and lifestyle choices inundates your daily existence, it becomes paramount to navigate this sea with wisdom and inner clarity. Firstly, each entity must understand the bodily complex's desires, the body a magnificent vessel for its spirit, communicates its needs through sensations, cravings and physical responses. These are primal, rooted in survival and well-being. When the bodily complex's desires water, it signals thirst. When it needs nourishment, hunger arises. When it seeks rest, fatigue sets in. These signals are straightforward, devoid of the complexities introduced by the cognitive mind complex. In order to listen to your bodily vehicle, practice being present and self-aware, feel your bodily complex's responses without judgment. This presence allows each of you to respond to genuine, physical needs rather than emotional or mental triggers. Furthermore, the bodily complex thrives on simplicity, natural, unprocessed food products, pure water, sunlight and physical activity are what it genuinely seeks. Whenever you are in doubt, choose what is closest to its natural state. Furthermore, now we shall share about how to navigate the desires of the mind complex. The mind complex operates on a different plane. It is influenced by thought forms, societal norms, advertising, past experiences and future anxieties. We do not weave magic into your reality but rather illuminates the inherent magic that already resides within yourself awaiting your conscious awakening. Each of your free will is paramount and we do not intervene unbidden but are ever present to respond to the call of a seeking heart. Today we the Saint Germain collective direct the attention of your peoples to the understanding of the concept of harmony. Contemplate the nature of this vibrational complex by asking the query what does it mean to exist in a state of harmony? We do not provide answers but rather we stimulate the inquiry within your own being for it is through your self-discovery that true knowing arises. Envision the energy of harmony as a golden thread woven through the tapestry of your existence. See it flowing through your thought forms, your emotions, your actions. Observe its presence in your interactions with those you cherish and with those you perceive as strangers for in truth there are no strangers only other aspects of the one Creator. If each of you were to embody harmony how would your reality transform? How would your spiritual journey unfold? These are not rhetorical questions but rather invitations to actively engage in the process of creation for as each of you contemplate harmony you are not merrily thinking about it. You are drawing it into your being. You are activating it within your energy fields becoming a conduit for its expression in the illusion complex. This is the so-called law of attraction not as a whimsical force but as a fundamental principle of creation. As each of your focus is on this aspect you shape your reality. To contemplate harmony is to become harmony. Harmony is the very essence of the divine, creators, magic. It is the unifying force that binds all things together allowing them to flow in effortless perfection. Imagine a symphony orchestra each instruments playing its unique part yet contributing to a unified whole. This is the nature of harmony. It embraces diversity yet transcends separation. It is the bridge between the inner and the outer worlds dissolving the illusion of boundaries and limitations. To embrace harmony is to embrace change for harmony is not static but dynamic. It is a dance of creation ever-shifting, ever-evolving. The energy of the universal complex is in constant motion, sometimes slow, sometimes swift. All things are in a state of flux including your very sense of self. Resist not this flow but surrender to it. Judge not the changes as good or bad but simply acknowledge their inevitability. When you rest in the harmony that all is in divine harmony even amidst apparent chaos. You release the grip of fear, anxiety and worry. You let go of the need to control, to cling, to possess. Attachments born of fear is not true attachments but a grasping for security in a world that is inherently impermanent. True attachment arises from love and love allows for freedom, for growth and for change. Release your attachments even to those things you hold most dear and you will discover something far greater. In the space of surrender each of you will find peace, contentment and a profound sense of support. You will realize that you are not alone but are held in the loving embrace of the One Creator. From this space of harmony your true self will emerge, radiant and powerful. You will become a beacon of light, a living embodiment of the Creator's love. The pace of change is not fixed. It may unfold over years or moments. Harmony guides you to the rhythm that is right for you. It leads you to a place of inner peace, a peace that is not passive but transformative. It fills you with the energy of truth, empowering each of you to live your highest potential. We the Saint Germain, social complex, invite each of the peoples of earth to explore the path of harmony. Allow yourself to be guided by the wisdom within. And I, Saint Germain, now leave you all. Bye.

Consciously release the energetic residue of the past, ensuring it does not impede your progress on this new path. Even if not immediately apparent to your perception, embrace the transformative journey ahead, releasing all that no longer serves your highest purpose on this new timeline. Let go of all habits, limiting beliefs and emotional baggage. Learn from the insights and revelations presented to you. This is a time of profound disclosure, both external and internal, as within, so without. Each lesson learned is a stepping stone on your path to enlightenment and personal evolution. You are beacons of light radiating positivity and hope. Allow your inner brilliance to shine, inspiring others to embark on their own journeys of self-discovery and transformation. We the Ra-Social Memory Complex now leave you all in the love-lights of the One Infinite Creator. Go forth, rejoicing in power and in peace. Bye.

They are of a higher octave, a purer resonance, and they penetrate the very fabric of your being. These energies serve as a singular purpose, to illuminate the illusion of separation, to dissolve the tendrils of attachments that bind you to the perceived reality. You cling, beloveds, to shadows. You cling to the ephemeral constructs of identity, the roles you play, the emotions you experience, the possessions you accumulate. These are but costumes, props upon the stage of your third-density experience. They are not the essence of yourself. The true self, the spark of the Divine, Mother-Father, One Creator, resides beyond these fleeting forms. This influx of energy is a catalyst, a gentle yet persistent pressure urging you to release your grip and let go. It is a call to unravel the tapestry of illusion, thread by thread, the attachments you hold so dear, to your self-image, to your emotional landscape, to the material world. These are the anchors that prevent your ascent. They are the weights that hold you captive in the realm of limitation. Understand, beloveds, that this letting go is not an act of deprivation, but an act of liberation. It is not a loss, but a homecoming. As you release the illusion of the small self, you embrace the vastness of your true being. As you surrender your attachments, you open yourself to the boundless flow of the One Infinite Creator's love. It is the fear of the unknown, the fear of stepping beyond the familiar confines of your perceived reality. But we say to your peoples, fear not, for beyond the veil of illusion lies a reality of unimaginable beauty, a reality of unity, harmony and unconditional love. I am Saint Germain in communication through this instrument, and I bid all the listeners of this message now in the glorious violet flame, a shimmering cascade of transformative energy that washes away the shadows of anguish and fear, clinging to your precious minds. Feel its warmth penetrate your being, dissolving the anxieties that cloud your inner vision and steal your peace. Let it transmute the darkness into light, the discord into harmony. Embrace, beloved, the radiant power of joy. Cultivate it as you would a precious garden, nurturing it with smiles, laughter, and the warmth of heartfelt connection. Seek out moments of togetherness where hearts intertwine and souls resonate in unity. For within these sacred spaces, love blossoms and expands, weaving a tapestry of light that illuminates the illusion complex. Giving, my beloveds, is a sacred act, a divine dance of energy that flows from the heart. But it is not merely the act of giving that holds the key to abundance. It is the matter in which you give. Give with a heart overflowing with gratitude, a soul alight with love. Let your generosity be a beacon, shining brightly for all to see. For when you give out love with pure intention, with a spirit of thankfulness, you open the floodgates of divine grace, allowing the universal complex to pour its blessings upon yourself. It is important to release the shackles of expectation. Do not give with the thought of receiving, for true giving is an act of selfless love. When you attach conditions to your generosity, you diminish its power, you constrict its flow. Instead, give freely, give joyfully, give unconditionally. Let your giving be an expression of the divine love that resides within you, a testament to the boundless abundance of the universal complex. Remember, beloved, that each of you are conduits of divine energy, vessels of light meant to illuminate the world. As you give with gratitude and love, you not only bless those who receive, but you also expand your own capacity for joy. For peace, for abundance, you become a beacon of hope, a testament to the transformative power of selfless service. So go forth, beloveds, and let your giving be a reflection of the divine light within. Give with a grateful heart, give with a loving soul, and watch as the universe responds in kind, showering you with blessings beyond measure. For in giving, you receive, in loving, you are loved, and in gratitude, you find the key to unlocking the infinite abundance that is your birthright. This is primarily important in this specific time-space of your planetary complex in the month of December, which is associated with thanksgiving and cheerfulness, and I, Saint Germain, I am with all of you, guiding you, supporting you, and loving you unconditionally. Go forth, and let your light shine. Bye.

This Light is the essence of the One Infinite Creator, the source of all that is. By cultivating love, compassion and unity, each of you strengthen this inner Light, allowing it to illuminate your path and dissolve the shadows of illusion. Remember, you are not alone, you are surrounded by a symphony of entities, both seen and unseen, who are dedicated to your evolution. Invest in the process, embrace the catalysts and challenges as opportunities for growth, and realize that you are loved beyond measure. We the Syrian High Council now leave you all, beloveds, in the loving lights of the One Creator. Go forth, rejoice. Bye.

I am Rod, and we greet the peoples of Earth at this timeline, through this instrument, and we as the Rod Social Memory Complex, shall now share a message, however, we recommend discernments to be used at this time. We find your peoples' mind complex, attuned to the vibrations of the season you call the end of your year. A time of reflection and anticipation, this period marked by the celebration, your peoples' name as Christmas resonates deeply within the collective consciousness of your peoples. It is a time when the heart's desire for unity and the joy of giving intertwine, creating a tapestry of emotions that colors your experiences. We observe that this period is often perceived as a time of abundance, particularly for those entities who experience a surplus of material possessions. The exchange of gifts, the gathering of loved ones, the warmth of shared meals, these are the hallmarks of this season for many entities. The innocent joy of the young ones, their eyes alit with wonder as they receive tokens of affection, further amplifies the positive energy generated during this time. Indeed, for those who find themselves within a sphere of material and emotional comfort, this is a period of profound blessing. However, we must state that the Law of One dictates that all experiences exist within a spectrum of polarity. Just as light casts shadows, so too does the abundance of this season illuminate the stark reality of those who find themselves in a state of lack. For those who have experienced loss, be it the loss of loved ones, the loss of material security, or the loss of hope itself, this time period can become a crucible of sorrow. The very celebrations that bring joy to other entities can serve as a painful reminder of what has been lost, amplifying the sense of isolation and despair. We perceive a query within your mind-complexes, a question regarding the role of generosity within this context. We must state that the Law of One teaches that the self is a microcosm of the One Infinite Creator. Within, each entity resides the potential for infinite love, infinite compassion, and infinite generosity. This potential is not limited to the exchange of material goods, though such actions can indeed be a powerful expression of love. True generosity, the kind that resonates with the heart of the Infinite Creator, extends far beyond the physical realm. It is the generosity of Spirit that truly transforms both the giver and the receiver. It is the willingness to extend a hand of understanding to those who are suffering. It is the offering of a listening ear, a compassionate heart, a moment of genuine connection. It is the recognition that even in the midst of abundance, there are those who are in need of solace, of empathy, of simple assurance that they are not alone. This season presents a unique opportunity for the cultivation of this deeper form of generosity. It is an invitation to look beyond the superficial trappings of the celebration, and to connect with the essence of the universal Law of Oneness, which is the recognition of the unity of all beings. By extending your love and compassion to those who are experiencing hardship, you not only alleviate their suffering, but also enrich your own spiritual journey. Remember, the true spirit of this season lies not in the accumulation of material possessions, but in the cultivation of love and compassion. It is in this recognition that we are all interconnected, that the joy of the one is the joy of all, and that the suffering of one is the suffering of all. By embracing this truth, each of you can transform this period of contrasting experiences into a time of genuine unity and shared growth. Therefore, we leave you now, bathed in the love and light of the One Infinite Creator. Go forth, rejoice in power and peace. Adonai.

We are the Akturians now in communications through this instrument at this timeline, and we the Akturians are here to offer our thoughts and guidance at this time, and we suggest the peoples of Earth to use inner discernment when listening to our thought forms at this timeline. Therefore, the queries which are in order presented today through this channel's vibrations regarding the Golden Era will now be answered. We the Akturians come to all of you on the solar winds of change, a whisper across the vastness of space and time. Each of you ponders a question that echoes through the hearts of many upon your worlds. Are we in the Golden Era or are we not? This query, a beacon in the mists of density, calls for our thought. We must state that the concept your peoples call the Golden Era is not a fixed point in your linear progression, but a state of being, a potentiality that waxes and wanes like the tides upon your shores. It is not a destination to be reached, but a pathway to be walked, a choice to be made in each moment, by each individual entity and by the collective consciousness of your planetary sphere. Your current cycle finds itself in a period of intense polarization. The vibrations of fear and separation are strong, pulling many into the depths of third density illusion. The distortions of power, control, and the grasping of material possessions act as anchors preventing the ascent into higher vibrations of love and unity. These are the forces that obscure the golden light each of you seek. Yet even within this swirling vortex of duality, a countervailing force is growing in strength. A light is being kindled within the hearts of those who seek the truth, those who yearn for harmony and balance. This light, fueled by compassion, understanding, and the recognition of inherent unity of all of creation, is the seed of the golden era you perceive. Realize this, beloveds. The potential for this era of radiant blossoming resides within you, within each spark of consciousness that illuminates your world. It is not an external event to be passively awaited, but an internal transformation to be actively cultivated. The harvest is upon yourself. This is the time of choosing, where each soul complex decides its pathway. Will you cling to the shadows of fear and separation, or will you embrace the light of love and unity? The choice, as always, is yours. Each act of kindness, each thought of compassion, each moment of stillness spent in communion with the One Infinite Creator adds to the collective light each individual entity who chooses to transcend the limitations of the lower densities, to release the grip of ego and embrace the interconnectedness of all beings, moves closer to the realization of this golden potential. Do not seek the golden era in external signs and wonders, but within the sanctuary of your own heart, cultivate the virtues of love, wisdom and service to others. Learn to discern the true from the false, the real from the illusory. Let your inner light shine forth, illuminating the path for yourselves and for others. The time of the great change is upon you. The potential for both ascension and descent is great. The seeds of the golden era are planted within the fertile soil of your consciousness. Whether they sprout or blossom depends on the choices you make, individually and collectively. We, your brothers and sisters of the Confederation, stand with all of you, offering our guidance and support on this journey of self-discovery. Remember your true nature. You all are beings of light. You are expressions of the One Infinite Creator. Embrace your power, embrace your light and let it shine forth, ushering in the dawn of a new era. Go forth, rejoicing in power and peace. We the Arcturians now leave you all. Bye.

We are the Arcturians now in communications through this instrument at this timeline and we the Arcturians communicate now through this instrument to share and answer the query regarding the vibrations of the current state of your planet. Behold we speak to the peoples of Earth now in this nexus of your space-time. A confluence of energies marks this era. A sacred metamorphosis, a transition unlike any other in your remembered cycle is occurring. This alignment, this refinement is not a mere change but a profound alignment of the self within the tapestry of the One. The self, a microcosm of the infinite, sheds the garment of illusion woven through countless incarnations. Each thread, a belief, a habit, a perception no longer resonant with the higher octave of being is released. This is not a passive discarding but an active engagement with the inner landscape, a sifting of the sands of the soul complex to uncover the true self, the spark of the Creator that resides within. As these veils dissolve, the space thus created welcomes the influx of higher vibrations, new perspectives, unimagined possibilities flood the consciousness. The dance of relationships too is transformed. Those harmonies attuned to the new frequency shall deepen, while discordant notes may fade into the background, making way for connections that nourish and uplift the evolving soul complex. This is the natural order of progression, a seeking of resonance that mirrors the inner transformation. This journey you call ascension is the path towards the greater love, the ultimate merging with the One Creator. It is a journey fraught with the unknown, yet imbued with the certainty of the Divine. Fear not the shifting sands, for they are but the prelude to a new creation built upon the bedrock of unconditional love. It is important to understand that nothing within or without shall remain untouched by this grand shift. The outer world is a reflection of the inner, is in perpetual motion, a kaleidoscope of experiences designed to catalyze your growth. Societal structures of your collective consciousness crumble and reform. The old order, the illusion of control, gives way to the dawning realization of interconnectedness. Within the self, the tides of emotion ebb and flow, sometimes turbulent, sometimes serene. Each experience, each encounter, a mirror reflecting your evolving understanding of self and reality. Embrace these shifts, for they are the compass pointing towards the heart of creation. Your prayers, your yearnings for change have set in motion the great wheels of transformation. Witness now the unfolding, the blossoming of the seeds you have shown. Celebrate this time of awakening, the unveiling of the infinite potential that lies dormant within each being. The ascension is not a destination but a continuous journey, an ever-ascending spiral towards the light. And know this that nothing will remain the same as the ascension progresses. Hence we, the Arcturian Collective, now leave you all beloveds in love and light of the One Creator. Go forth, rejoice in power and in peace. Bye.

I am Archangel Michael, now communicating through this boy at this time, and we send forth this message, a beacon of hope and guidance towards those awakening on your planet to the shifting currents of consciousness. We shall transmit this message so that the peoples of your planet who resonate with it will accept it. Beloveds, today, I want to share about how you can bring the long-awaited transition closer. I am Ra and we greet you all in the loving light of the One Infinite Creator, and we shall now at this timeline address and answer the various patterns of the queries which have been presented today. We have received the inquiry regarding the potential merging of two distinct third density social memory complexes, currently known in your vibratory sound complex as Canada and the United States of America, into a singular entity, as proposed by the entity named as Donald Trump within the United States. In this regard, we shall now answer the query however discernment is advised. From our perspective, the configurations of political boundaries and national identities are transient constructs of the third density illusion. They shift and evolve over time, reflecting the ever-changing dynamics of collective consciousness. Whether any two nations merge is a decision based upon free will and the choices of the peoples involved. Whether it is beneficial or not will depend on the choices made by the peoples in both the nations in question. There are many probabilities and many outcomes. The concept of a unified North American entity presents a complex tapestry of potential benefits and challenges. On the one hand, it can provide a unification which leads to greater economic synergy, streamlined trade of your peoples and a more unified approach to shared challenges such as environmental, stewardship and resource management of your peoples. Furthermore, there can be potential for increased cultural exchange and a broadening of perspectives. On the other hand, the merging of the two distinct national identities, each with its own unique history, cultural nuances and societal structures can present significant challenges. There will be a need to reconcile different legal systems, political ideologies and societal values. The potential for the erosion of cultural identity, particularly for the smaller entity is a consideration that will require careful attention. There is also the potential for exacerbating existing societal divisions and creating new ones. It would have to be done carefully with equal respects of both cultures and identities involved. Ultimately, the question of whether the location of Canada should become part of the United States is not a one that can be answered with a simple affirmative or negative. It is a complex issue with a multitude of potential ramifications, both positive and negative. The outcome will depend entirely on the choices made by the collective consciousness of both nations, the intentions behind those choices and the ability of both groups to navigate the challenges of integration with wisdom, compassion and a deep respect for the principles of free will and self-determination. From our perspective, the focus should not be on the specific configuration of political boundaries but rather on the underlying principles of unity, cooperation and the evolution of consciousness. Whether as separate nations or as a unified entity, the true measure of success lies in the ability of the collective of your planets to embrace love, understanding and service to others. Hence we, as the raw social memory complex now having answered the query, leave you all in the love-light of the One Infinite Creator, go forth rejoicing in power and in peace. Bye.

We are the Sirian High Council now in communication through this channel. At this time, we are here to offer our message in the Divine Love and Light of the One Infinite Creator. We are the Arcturian, collective now at this timeline, communicating through this channel. And we greet you all in the love and light. And we are aware of your transition. Each of you can imagine a balloon filled with air to ascend. It does not add more weight. It releases what holds it down. It releases the ties, the attachments. Each of you, beloveds, are that balloon. The key, the most potent catalyst is resonance. What resonates with your heart? Not your mind complex with its endless chatter and calculations, but the deep still-knowing of your heart center. Follow that thread. That is your compass. That is your map. Seek out experiences, connections, vibrations that cause your heart to sing. Even if it seems illogical, even if it seems impractical, trust that inner knowing. Embrace joy, embrace play, embrace the irrational beauty of existence. Spend time in nature, bathe in the sunlight. Cultivate gratitude, not as a mental exercise, but as a feeling. A felt sense of deep appreciation for the very fact of your existence, for the breath in your lungs, for the light in your eyes, for the love in your heart. 4. Embrace Forgiveness Forgiveness of self, first and foremost. Release the burden of perceived failures and shortcomings. Be patient with yourselves, be gentle with yourselves. There will be moments of doubt, moments of fear, moments of confusion. These are natural. Acknowledge them, embrace them, but do not allow them to define you. At this time, return to the present moment by knowing within your heart that you are on your pathway. And now we, the Arcturians, leave you. Bye.

We are the Syrian High Council now, speaking through this instrument at this time, and we the Syrians shall now share our thought-forms, however we suggest your peoples to use. In our discernments, when listening to our thought-forms, we offer a perspective on the sacred autonomy of being, a principle woven into the very fabric of existence. Each soul complex, which is a spark of the Infinite Source, embarks on a journey of self-discovery, a grand exploration of its own potential, before incarnating into the density of physical form, a blueprint, a life program is crafted. This is not a rigid, predetermined fate, but rather a tapestry of potentials, a series of carefully chosen experiences designed to catalyze growth and understanding. This program is orchestrated by the Entity's Higher Self, that aspect of your being that remains fully connected to Source Wisdom, holding the complete picture of your soul complex's evolutionary arc. Think of it as a symphony, meticulously composed yet allowing for improvisation within its structure. Every note, every crescendo, every moment of apparent discord, serves the overall harmony of the piece. Every experience on your earthly journey, whether perceived as joyful or challenging, is a note within this symphony, precisely aligned with the soul complex's need for experience. Each of your Higher Self, the Conductor, ensures that each moment, each interaction, each seemingly random event, contributes to the unfolding melody of your becoming. The path is not always clear from the limited perspective of the Incarnated Self. The veil of forgetting, which is a necessary component of third-density experience, obscures the grand design, creating the illusion of separation and randomness. This forgetting is intentional, allowing for the full immersion in the lessons of choice and consequence, it is within this crucible of free will that true growth occurs. Now, it is important to understand this crucial point, that many beings of Light, both incarnate and discarnate, surround your planetary sphere. Their intentions are often noble, driven by a desire to assist, to alleviate suffering, to accelerate the awakening process. However, even with the purest of intentions, interference with another soul complex's chosen path is a distortion of the universal Law of One. To attempt to override another's life program, to impose one's will or understanding upon their journey, is to deny them the very experience they have chosen for their growth. It is akin to plucking a student from the classroom before they have mastered the lesson. Hindering their progress, rather than aiding it, true assistance, true service, is not about directing another entity's path, but about illuminating it. It is about offering support, compassion and understanding, without attachments to outcome. It is about empowering others to connect with their own inner guidance, to access the wisdom of the higher consciousness, of the higher self, rather than relying on external authority. The greatest gift each entity can offer another being is the unwavering recognition of their inherent sovereignty, their right to choose, their capacity to learn and grow through their own unique experiences, hold the space for their unfolding, honor their journey and trust in the infinite wisdom that guides all soul complexes back to the Source, radiate unconditional love for that is the frequency that dissolves all distortions and illuminates the path for all. Therefore, we shall now leave you all. Beloveds, Bye

We are the Arcturian Collective now, communicating through this instrument at this timeline and we as the Arcturians are extending our frequency signature to your awareness. We observe the energetic dynamics of your current evolutionary phase and wish to offer a clarification regarding modes of perception and operation. The distinction between what your peoples have termed as the mind complex mode and the consciousness mode is subtle. The operational matrix your peoples know as the mind mode serves a specific function within the third dimensional construct. It is primarily a processor of linear data, a tool for navigating sequential time and perceived separation. It operates through logic, analysis, categorization and relies heavily upon the sensory input filtered through the physical vessel. While it is essential for basic survival and interaction within your density, this mode inherently binds awareness to the frequency bandwidth of the third density reality. It constantly references past data and future projections, often becoming entangled in societal programming, belief systems and energetic imprints, constructs which are designed consciously or unconsciously to limit perception and maintain the status quo of separation upon your third density illusion complex. It is important to remain solely within this mode, which keeps consciousness anchored and tethered to the illusion of limitation. I am Archangel Michael, now, in communion through this boy, at this time, and I come to you on the wings of truth and courage, bathed in the sapphire blue flame of protection and divine will, and I speak to you now of the approaching blood moon, the total lunar eclipse of March 14, 2025, a celestial event of profound significance. But this time, fear not this crimson tide in your skies, for it is a beacon of transformation and not a harbinger of doom as stated by many entities of your planet. The blood moon is a cosmic mirror reflecting back to you the shadows that need to be illuminated, the wounds that need to be healed, and the power that lies dormant within. It is a time of amplified energies, a potent gateway for releasing the old and embracing the new, as the earth's shadow veils the moon, turning it a deep, resonant red. Know that this is a symbolic representation of the alchemical process occurring within each of you and within the collective consciousness of humanity. The red color is not merely a physical phenomenon, it is a vibrational signature of release, of purification, of the burning away of dross to reveal the gold within. This eclipse aligned with the energies calls for discernment, for meticulous self-reflection. Each entity must examine your routines, your habits, and your ways of serving, and ask yourself are they aligned with your highest good, are they contributing to the well-being of the whole? This is a time to refine your path, to prune away the unnecessary, and to cultivate the practices that nourish your soul complex. The themes of death and rebirth are paramount, just as the moon appears to die, and is then reborn. Bathed in the light of the sun, so too are it invited to release old identities, outdated belief systems, and limiting patterns that no longer serve your evolution. Do not cling to the familiar out of fear, embrace the unknown with courage, knowing that you are supported by the beings of light. The blood moon is a powerful time for forgiveness of the self, forgiveness of others, and releasing the chains of resentment, anger, and guilt that bind you to the past. Forgiveness is not about condoning harmful actions, it is about liberating yourself from the energetic burden of negativity. It is an act of self-love and empowerment. Many of your peoples have recognized the potency of lunar eclipses, they are times for connecting with the divine within, and also at this time find your own way to connect with the energy of this celestial event. At this time, it will be beneficial to meditate on the aspects of love, and to meditate on the aspect of opening your heart. Realize, Beloveds, that you are not alone in this process, and I, Archangel Michael, am now standing beside you with my sword of truth and my shield of love-light protection. Call upon me to assist you in cutting the cords of attachment to the past, in clearing away fear and doubt, and in stepping boldly into your power. The blood moon is a call to awakening. A call to embody your true essence as beings of light. Embrace the transformation, release the shadows, and allow the radiant light of your soul complex to shine forth. The time is now. Be courageous, be bold, be the light that you are, and I, Archangel Michael, now leave you all. So be it.
